trans-unit.source: After an observer is created, the next step is to use the PerformanceObserver.observe() method to specify the set of performance events to observe. In the following example, the observer only registers for "frame" performance entry notifications.
trans-unit.target: 创建观察者后，下一步是使用 PerformanceObserver.observe() 方法指定要观察的性能事件集。在下面的示例中，观察者仅注册“ frame ” performance entry 通知。

trans-unit.source: After calling HTMLMediaElement.play() on the <video>, there's a (hopefully brief) period of time that elapses before the stream of video begins to flow. To avoid blocking until that happens, we add an event listener to video, canplay, which is delivered when the video playback actually begins. At that point, all the properties in the video object have been configured based on the stream's format.
trans-unit.target: 在 <video> 上调用 HTMLMediaElement.play() 之后，有一段（希望很短的）时间流逝，视频流才开始流动。为了避免阻塞直到发生这种情况，我们在 video ， canplay 中添加了一个事件侦听器，该侦听器在视频播放实际开始时提供。此时，已根据流的格式配置了 video 对象中的所有属性。

trans-unit.source: After creating our RTCPeerConnection and saving it as myPeerConnection, we pass the description included in the received offer message, msg, directly into setRemoteDescription() to tell the user agent's WebRTC layer what configuration the caller has proposed using. When our promise fulfillment handler is called, indicating that this has been done, we create a stream, add it to the connection, then create an SDP answer and call setLocalConnection() to set that as the configuration at our end of the call before forwarding that answer to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 在创建我们的 RTCPeerConnection 并将其保存为 myPeerConnection 之后，我们将包含在收到的报价消息 msg 中的描述直接传递到 setRemoteDescription() 中,以告诉用户代理的WebRTC层呼叫者已提议使用什么配置。当我们的诺言履行处理程序被调用时，表明已经完成了，我们创建一个流，将其添加到连接中，然后创建一个SDP答案，并调用 setLocalConnection() 将其设置为我们在调用结束时的配置，然后进行转发给呼叫者的答案。

trans-unit.source: After creating the RTCPeerConnection, we set up handlers for the events that matter to us.
trans-unit.target: 创建 RTCPeerConnection 之后，我们为与我们相关的事件设置处理程序。

trans-unit.source: After creating the RTCPeerConnection for the caller (callerPC), we look to see if it has an addTrack() method. If it does, we set hasAddTrack to true; otherwise, we set it to false. This variable will let the example operate even on browsers not yet implementing the newer addTrack() method; we'll do so by falling back to the older addStream() method.
trans-unit.target: 在为调用方（ callerPC ）创建 RTCPeerConnection 之后，我们看一下它是否具有 addTrack() 方法。如果是这样，我们将 hasAddTrack 设置为 true ；否则，将其设置为 false 。这个变量将使示例即使在尚未实现较新的 addTrack() 方法的浏览器上也可以运行；我们将通过使用旧的 addStream() 方法来实现。

trans-unit.source: After creating the elements that will represent the key and its label, we configure the key's element by setting its class to "key" (which establishes its appearance). Then we add data-* attributes which contain the key's octave (attribute data-octave), string representing the note to play (attribute data-note), and frequency (attribute data-frequency) in Hertz. This will let us easily fetch that information as needed when handling events.
trans-unit.target: 在创建将表示键及其标签的元素之后，我们通过将键的类设置为“键”（确定其外观）来配置键的元素。然后，我们添加 data-* 属性，该属性包含键的八度（attribute data-octave ），表示要播放的音符的字符串（attribute data-note ）和频率（attribute data-frequency ）（以赫兹为单位）。这将使我们在处理事件时根据需要轻松获取该信息。

trans-unit.source: After declaring the key range, we log its lower property value to the console, which should appear as "F".
trans-unit.target: 声明键范围后，我们将其 lower 属性值记录到控制台，该控制台应显示为“ F”。

trans-unit.source: After declaring the key range, we log its lowerOpen property value to the console, which should appear as "true": the lower bound is open, so won't be included in the range.
trans-unit.target: 声明键范围后，我们将其 lowerOpen 属性值记录到控制台，该值应显示为“ true”：下限是打开的，因此不会包含在范围中。

trans-unit.source: After declaring the key range, we log its upper property value to the console, which should appear as "W".
trans-unit.target: 声明键范围后，我们将其 upper 属性值记录到控制台，该控制台应显示为“ W”。

trans-unit.source: After declaring the key range, we log its upperOpen property value to the console, which should appear as "true": the upper bound is open, so won't be included in the range.
trans-unit.target: 声明键范围后，我们将其 upperOpen 属性值记录到控制台，该值应显示为“ true”：上限已打开，因此不会包含在范围中。

trans-unit.source: After decoding the CBOR encoded ArrayBuffer, the resulting JavaScript object will contain the following properties:
trans-unit.target: 解码CBOR编码的ArrayBuffer后，所得的JavaScript对象将包含以下属性：

trans-unit.source: After drawing the line, we call Array.splice() to replace the previous information about the touch point with the current information in the ongoingTouches array.
trans-unit.target: 画完线后，我们调用 Array.splice() 来将有关触摸点的先前信息替换为进行中的 ongoingTouches 数组中的当前信息。

trans-unit.source: After executing the above code, el contains the first element in the document whose ID is one of main, basic, or exclamation.
trans-unit.target: 执行上述代码后， el 包含文档中ID为 main ， basic 或 exclamation 之一的第一个元素。

trans-unit.source: After generating a suitable set of keyframes from the property value lists, each supplied offset is applied to the corresponding keyframe. If there are insufficient values, or if the list contains null values, the keyframes without specified offsets will be evenly spaced as with the array format described above.
trans-unit.target: 从属性值列表生成一组合适的关键帧后，每个提供的偏移量将应用于相应的关键帧。如果没有足够的值，或者列表中包含 null 值，则没有指定偏移量的关键帧将按照上述数组格式均匀分布。

trans-unit.source: After getting a reference to the <ul> which contains the list of user names into the variable listElem, we empty the list by removing each of its child elements.
trans-unit.target: 在引用包含用户名列表的 <ul> 到变量 listElem 中之后，我们通过删除列表的每个子元素来清空列表。

trans-unit.source: After getting access to the output list element in the variable connectionView, navigator.receiver is used to get a reference to the PresentationReceiver object for this context, and its connectionList is used to get a Promise which will be called when the list is available.
trans-unit.target: 在访问了变量 connectionView 中的输出列表元素之后， navigator.receiver 用于获取对此上下文的 PresentationReceiver 对象的引用，而其 connectionList 用于获取 Promise ，当列表可用时将调用该Promise。

trans-unit.source: After getting the WebGL context, gl, we need to begin by building the shader program. Here, we're using code designed to let us add multiple shaders to our program quite easily. The array shaderSet contains a list of objects, each describing one shader function to be compiled into the program. Each function has a type (one of gl.VERTEX_SHADER or gl.FRAGMENT_SHADER) and an ID (the ID of the <script> element containing the shader's code).
trans-unit.target: 获取WebGL上下文 gl 之后，我们需要开始构建着色器程序。在这里，我们使用的代码旨在让我们很容易地在程序中添加多个着色器。数组 shaderSet 包含一个对象列表，每个对象描述一个要编译到程序中的着色器函数。每个函数都有一个类型（ gl.VERTEX_SHADER 或 gl.FRAGMENT_SHADER 之一）和一个ID（包含着色器代码的 <script> 元素的ID ）。

trans-unit.source: After grabbing references to the output <div> and the HTML element (so we can output diagnostic messages and update the app background color later on), we implement an onclick handler so that when the screen is tapped/clicked, the speech recognition service will start. This is achieved by calling SpeechRecognition.start(). The forEach() method is used to output colored indicators showing what colors to try saying.
trans-unit.target: 抓取对输出 <div> 和HTML元素的引用（以便我们以后可以输出诊断消息并更新应用背景颜色）之后，我们实现一个onclick处理程序，以便在点击/单击屏幕时，语音识别服务将开始。这是通过调用 SpeechRecognition.start() 实现的。该 forEach() 方法被用来显示什么颜色尽量说输出彩色指标。

trans-unit.source: After having prompted the user for permission, returns the audio or video stream associated to a camera or microphone on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 在提示用户允许后,将相关的音频或视频流返回到本地计算机上的摄像头或麦克风。

trans-unit.source: After having seen how to apply styles and colors in the previous chapter, we will now have a look at how to draw text onto the canvas.
trans-unit.target: 在上一章中了解了如何应用样式和颜色之后，我们现在来看看如何在画布上绘制文本。

trans-unit.source: After pulling references to the two <video> elements, we check if a WebRTC connection exists; if it does, we proceed to disconnect and close the call:
trans-unit.target: 在提取对两个 <video> 元素的引用之后，我们检查是否存在WebRTC连接；如果是这样，我们将继续断开并关闭通话：

trans-unit.source: After realizing, to my delight, that the nifty <canvas> element I'd been reading about was not only soon to be supported in Firefox, but was already supported in the current version of Safari, I had to try a little experiment.
trans-unit.target: 令我高兴的是，意识到我正在阅读的漂亮的 <canvas> 元素不仅很快将在Firefox中得到支持，而且在当前版本的Safari中已经得到支持，我不得不尝试一下实验。

trans-unit.source: After realizing, to my delight, that the nifty <canvas> element I'd been reading about was not only soon to be supported in Firefox, but was already supported in the current version of Safari, I had to try a little experiment.
After running this code, the resulting waveforms should look something like this:
trans-unit.target: 运行这段代码后,得到的波形应该是这样的。

trans-unit.source: After setLocalDescription(), the caller asks STUN servers to generate the ice candidates
trans-unit.target: setLocalDescription()后,调用者要求STUN服务器生成冰候选者

trans-unit.source: After setting audioTracks to be a list of the audio tracks on the stream from the user's microphone, it's time to add the media to the caller's RTCPeerConnection. If addTrack() is available on the RTCPeerConnection, we add each of the stream's audio tracks, one by one, to the connection using RTCPeerConnection.addTrack(). Otherwise we call RTCPeerConnection.addStream() to add the stream to the call as a single unit.
trans-unit.target: 在将 audioTracks 设置为来自用户麦克风的流中的音频轨道的列表之后，是时候将媒体添加到呼叫者的 RTCPeerConnection 了。如果 addTrack() 是可在 RTCPeerConnection ，我们添加的每个流的音频轨道，一个接一个，在连接使用 RTCPeerConnection.addTrack() 。否则，我们调用 RTCPeerConnection.addStream() 将流作为单个单元添加到调用中。

trans-unit.source: After setting the current shading program to shaderProgram, this code fetches the three uniforms "uScalingFactor", "uGlobalColor", and "uRotationVector", calling getUniformLocation() once for each uniform.
trans-unit.target: 将当前着色程序设置为 shaderProgram 之后，此代码将获取三个 "uScalingFactor" ， "uGlobalColor" 和 "uRotationVector" ，并为每个统一调用一次 getUniformLocation() 。

trans-unit.source: After setting the window's load event handler to be the setup() function, the stage is set. Let's see how the action plays out.
trans-unit.target: 将窗口的 load 事件处理程序 setup() 为setup（）函数后，将设置该阶段。让我们看看动作如何进行。

trans-unit.source: After setting up variables to more conveniently reference the button element and the two elements into which the latitude and logitude will be drawn, the event listener is established by calling addEventListener() on the <button> element. When the user clicks the button, we'll fetch and display the location information.
trans-unit.target: 在设置变量以更方便地引用button元素以及将要在其中绘制纬度和对数的两个元素之后，通过在 <button> 元素上调用 addEventListener() 来建立事件侦听器。当用户单击按钮时，我们将获取并显示位置信息。

trans-unit.source: After storing some of the event's processing in the ongoingTouches for later processing, the start point is drawn as a small circle. We're using a 4-pixel wide line, so a 4 pixel radius circle will show up neatly.
trans-unit.target: 在将事件的某些处理存储在进行中的 ongoingTouches 以进行后续处理之后，将起点绘制为一个小圆圈。我们使用的是4像素宽的线，因此4像素半径的圆圈会整齐地显示出来。

trans-unit.source: After testing this sample, note that the words hello and world are together: helloworld. So visually, when you see the HTML page it seems like the two text nodes hello and world are a single node, but remember that in the document model, there are two nodes. The second node is a new node of type TEXT_NODE, and it is the second child of the second <p> tag. The following figure shows the recently created Text Node object inside the document tree.
trans-unit.target: 测试完此样本后，请注意，单词hello和world在一起：helloworld。因此，从视觉上看，当您看到HTML页面时，似乎两个文本节点hello和world是单个节点，但是请记住，在文档模型中，有两个节点。第二个节点是TEXT_NODE类型的新节点，它是第二个<p>标记的第二个子节点。下图显示了文档树中最近创建的Text Node对象。

trans-unit.source: After that, directoryReader.readEntries() is called to read in all the entries in the directory. These are each, in turn, passed into a recursive call to scanFiles() to process them. Any of them which are files are simply inserted into the list; any which are directories are inserted into the list and a new level of the list's hierarchy is added below, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 之后，将调用 directoryReader.readEntries() 以读取目录中的所有条目。依次将它们分别传递给对 scanFiles() 的递归调用以处理它们。这些文件中的任何一个都可以简单地插入列表中。任何属于目录的内容都将插入到列表中，并在下面添加列表层次结构的新级别，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: After that, it is downloaded every 24 hours or so. It may be downloaded more frequently, but it must be downloaded every 24 hours to prevent bad scripts from being annoying for too long.
trans-unit.target: 之后，每24小时左右下载一次。它可能会更频繁地下载，但必须将每隔24小时下载，以防止不良脚本被恼人的太久。

trans-unit.source: After that, the code paths converge once again. The ad's background color is set to the value specified in the new ad's record, and elements' classes and contents are set appropriately as well.
trans-unit.target: 之后,代码路径再次收敛。广告的背景色被设置为新广告记录中指定的值,元素的类和内容也被适当设置。

trans-unit.source: After that, we create a combined Blob out of the recorded audio chunks, and create an object URL pointing to it, using window.URL.createObjectURL(blob). We then set the value of the <audio> element's src attribute to the object URL, so that when the play button is pressed on the audio player, it will play the Blob.
trans-unit.target: 之后，我们从录制的音频块中创建一个组合的 Blob ，并使用 window.URL.createObjectURL(blob) 创建指向它的对象URL 。然后，我们将 <audio> 元素的 src 属性的值设置为对象URL，以便在音频播放器上按下播放按钮时，它将播放 Blob 。

trans-unit.source: After that, we iterate over all the Touch objects in the list, pushing them onto an array of active touch points and drawing the start point for the draw as a small circle; we're using a 4-pixel wide line, so a 4 pixel radius circle will show up neatly.
trans-unit.target: 之后，我们遍历列表中的所有 Touch 对象，将它们推到活动的接触点数组上，并将绘制的起点画成一个小圆圈；我们使用的是4像素宽的线，因此4像素半径的圆圈会整齐地显示出来。

trans-unit.source: After that, we set up the handler for the shippingaddresschange event so we can validate address information and call the request's show() method to start running the payment UI.
trans-unit.target: 之后，我们为 shippingaddresschange 事件设置了处理程序，以便我们可以验证地址信息并调用请求的 show() 方法以开始运行付款用户界面。

trans-unit.source: After the dragend event has finished propagating, the drag and drop operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 在 dragend 事件完成传播之后，拖放操作完成。

trans-unit.source: After the chunks have all been written, we then perform the ready check once more, to check that the last chunk has finished being written and all the work is done. When this ready check fulfills, we invoke WritableStreamDefaultWriter.close() to close the stream. This also triggers the close() method specified inside the WritableStream() constructor, as discussed above.
trans-unit.target: 块全部写入后，我们再执行一次 ready 检查，以检查最后一个块已完成写入并且所有工作都已完成。完成此 ready 检查后，我们将调用 WritableStreamDefaultWriter.close() 以关闭流。如上所述，这还会触发 WritableStream() 构造函数内部指定的 close() 方法。

trans-unit.source: After the clientDataJSON is converted from an ArrayBuffer to a JavaScript object, it will have the following properties:
trans-unit.target: 当clientDataJSON从ArrayBuffer转换为JavaScript对象后,它将具有以下属性。

trans-unit.source: After the code is executed the object store should contain the value "2", since trans2 should run after trans1.
trans-unit.target: 执行代码后，对象存储区应包含值“ 2”，因为 trans2 应该在 trans1 之后运行。

trans-unit.source: After the initial keydown event, only keypress events are sent until the keyup event occurs; the inter-spaced keydown events are not sent.
trans-unit.target: 在初始按键事件发生后,只发送按键事件,直到发生上键事件,间隔的按键事件不发送。

trans-unit.source: After the split, the current node contains all the content up to the specified offset point, and a newly created node of the same type contains the remaining text. The newly created node is returned to the caller. If the original node had a parent, the new node is inserted as the next sibling of the original node. If the offset is equal to the length of the original node, the newly created node has no data.
trans-unit.target: 拆分后,当前节点包含了指定偏移点之前的所有内容,而新创建的同类型节点则包含了剩余的文本。新创建的节点会返回给调用者。如果原始节点有父节点,新节点将作为原始节点的下一个兄弟姐妹插入。如果偏移量等于原始节点的长度,则新创建的节点没有数据。

trans-unit.source: After this step the GPU pipeline will clip the out of range vertices, and send the model down to the fragment shader for rasterization.
trans-unit.target: 在这一步之后,GPU管道将剪辑出范围外的顶点,并将模型下发到片段着色器进行光栅化。

trans-unit.source: After using navigator.permissions.query() to find out if we have (or if the user will be prompted to allow) "clipboard-read" access, this example fetches the data currently on the clipboard. If it's not plain text, an error message is presented. Otherwise, an element referred to using the variable textElem has its contents replaced with the clipboard's contents.
trans-unit.target: 在使用 navigator.permissions.query() 查找我们是否具有（或将提示用户允许） "clipboard-read" 访问权限之后，本示例将获取剪贴板上当前的数据。如果不是纯文本，则会显示错误消息。否则，使用变量 textElem 引用的元素的内容将替换为剪贴板的内容。

trans-unit.source: After we've created a shader program we need to look up the locations that WebGL assigned to our inputs. In this case we have one attribute and two uniforms. Attributes receive values from buffers. Each iteration of the vertex shader receives the next value from the buffer assigned to that attribute. Uniforms are similar to JavaScript global variables. They stay the same value for all iterations of a shader. Since the attribute and uniform locations are specific to a single shader program we'll store them together to make them easy to pass around
trans-unit.target: 创建着色器程序后，我们需要查找WebGL分配给输入的位置。在这种情况下，我们有一个属性和两个制服。属性从缓冲区接收值。顶点着色器的每次迭代都会从分配给该属性的缓冲区中接收下一个值。统一类似于JavaScript全局变量。对于着色器的所有迭代，它们保持相同的值。由于属性和统一位置特定于单个着色器程序，因此我们将它们存储在一起以使它们易于传递

trans-unit.source: After you added three items in two different formats,
trans-unit.target: 在你以两种不同的格式添加了三个项目之后。

trans-unit.source: After your service worker is registered, the browser will attempt to install then activate the service worker for your page/site.
trans-unit.target: 在您的服务工作者注册后,浏览器将尝试安装并激活您的页面/网站的服务工作者。

trans-unit.source: Again, at the end of the code we invoke the draw() function to set the whole process in motion.
trans-unit.target: 同样,在代码的最后,我们调用draw()函数来设置整个过程的运动。

trans-unit.source: Again, with these parameters, compatible WebGL devices will automatically accept any resolution for that texture (up to their maximum dimensions). Without performing the above configuration, WebGL requires all samples of NPOT textures to fail by returning transparent black: rgba(0,0,0,0).
trans-unit.target: 同样，使用这些参数，兼容的WebGL设备将自动接受该纹理的任何分辨率（最大尺寸）。如果不执行上述配置，WebGL将要求所有NPOT纹理样本通过返回透明黑色来失败： rgba(0,0,0,0) 。

trans-unit.source: All Mozilla-based browsers offer tab-browsing and this is the preferred mode of opening referenced resources (SDK)... not just in Mozilla-based browsers but in all other browsers offering tab-browsing. In other words, tab-capable browser users overall prefer opening new tabs than opening new windows in a majority of webpage situations. Tab-capable browsers have rapidly gained support and enthusiasm on internet in the last 3 years; this trend will not revert back. MSIE 7, released in October 2006, has full support for tab browsing.
trans-unit.target: 所有基于Mozilla的浏览器都提供选项卡浏览，这是打开引用资源（SDK）的首选方式……不仅在基于Mozilla的浏览器中，而且在所有其他提供选项卡浏览的浏览器中。换句话说，在大多数网页情况下，具有标签页功能的浏览器用户总体上都喜欢打开新标签页而不是打开新窗口。具有标签功能的浏览器在过去三年中迅速获得了互联网的支持和热情；这种趋势不会恢复原状。MSIE 7发布于2006年10月，完全支持选项卡浏览。

trans-unit.source: All areas considered by the Intersection Observer API are rectangles; elements which are irregularly shaped are considered as occupying the smallest rectangle which encloses all of the element's parts. Similarly, if the visible portion of an element is not rectangular, the element's intersection rectangle is construed to be the smallest rectangle that contains all the visible portions of the element.
trans-unit.target: 交点观察员API考虑的所有区域都是矩形;形状不规则的元素被认为占据了包含该元素所有部分的最小矩形。同样,如果一个元素的可见部分不是矩形,该元素的交点矩形被解释为包含该元素所有可见部分的最小矩形。

trans-unit.source: All asynchronous operations immediately return an IDBRequest instance. Each request has a readyState that is set to the 'pending' state; this changes to 'done' when the request is completed or fails. When the state is set to done, every request returns a result and an error, and an event is fired on the request. When the state is still pending, any attempt to access the result or error raises an InvalidStateError exception.
trans-unit.target: 所有异步操作都会立即返回一个 IDBRequest 实例。每个请求都有一个 readyState ，它被设置为 'pending' 状态。当请求完成或失败时，它将更改为 'done' 。当状态设置为 done 时，每个请求都返回一个 result 和一个 error ，并在该请求上触发一个事件。当状态仍处于 pending 状态时，任何访问 result 或 error 尝试都会引发 InvalidStateError 异常。

trans-unit.source: All data transferred using WebRTC is encrypted. In the case of RTCDataChannel, the encryption used is Datagram Transport Layer Security (DTLS), which is based on Transport Layer Security (TLS). Since TLS is used to secure every HTTPS connection, any data you send on a data channel is as secure as any other data sent or received by the user's browser.
trans-unit.target: 使用WebRTC传输的所有数据均已加密。对于 RTCDataChannel ，使用的加密是基于传输层安全性（TLS）的数据报传输层安全性（DTLS ）。由于TLS用于保护每个HTTPS连接的安全，因此您在数据通道上发送的任何数据都与用户浏览器发送或接收的任何其他数据一样安全。

trans-unit.source: All the animation's playback relies on this timeline: seeking the animation moves the animation’s position along the timeline; slowing down or speeding up the playback rate condenses or expands its spread across the timeline; repeating the animation lines up additional iterations of it along the timeline. trans-unit.source: Also, the exact meaning of the QP value depends on the codec being used. For example, for the VP8 codec, the QP value can be anywhere from 1 to 127 and is found in the frame header element "y_ac_qi", whose value is defined in RFC 6386: 19.2. H.264 uses a QP which ranges from 0 to 51; in this case, it's an index used to derive a scaling matrix used during the quantization process. Additionally, QP is not likely to be the only parameter the codec uses to adjust the compression. See the individual codec specifications for details.
trans-unit.target: 同样，QP值的确切含义取决于所使用的编解码器。例如，对于VP8编解码器，QP值可以介于1到127之间，并且可以在帧头元素 "y_ac_qi" ，其值在RFC 6386：19.2中定义。H.264使用的QP范围为0到51；在这种情况下，它是用于导出量化过程中使用的缩放矩阵的索引。此外，QP不可能是编解码器用来调整压缩的唯一参数。有关详细信息，请参见各个编解码器规范。

trans-unit.source: Although the browser is required to support at least 150 resource timing performance entries in its resource timing buffer, some applications may use more resources than that limit. To help the developer manage the buffer size, Resource Timing defines two methods that extend the Performance interface. The clearResourceTimings() method removes all "resource" type performance entries from the browser's resource performance entry buffer. The setResourceTimingBufferSize() method sets the resource performance entry buffer size to the specified number of resource performance entries.
trans-unit.target: 尽管要求浏览器在其资源计时缓冲区中支持至少150个资源计时性能条目，但是某些应用程序可能使用的资源超过该限制。为了帮助开发人员管理缓冲区大小，资源计时定义了两种扩展 Performance 接口的方法。该 clearResourceTimings() 方法去除所有“ resource 从浏览器的资源性能条目缓冲区”类型的性能项。所述 setResourceTimingBufferSize() 方法设置资源性能条目缓冲器大小的资源的指定数目的 performance entries 。

trans-unit.source: Although the pointer event interfaces enable applications to create enhanced user experiences on pointer enabled devices, the reality is the vast majority of today's web content is designed to only work with mouse input. Consequently, even if a browser supports pointer events, the browser must still process mouse events so content that assumes mouse-only input will work as is without direct modification. Ideally, a pointer enabled application does not need to explicitly handle mouse input. However, because the browser must process mouse events, there may be some compatibility issues that need to be handled. This section contains information about pointer event and mouse event interaction and the ramifications for application developers.
trans-unit.target: 虽然指针事件接口使应用程序能够在支持指针的设备上创建增强的用户体验,但现实情况是,当今绝大多数的网络内容都被设计成只能使用鼠标输入。因此,即使浏览器支持指针事件,浏览器仍然必须处理鼠标事件,因此假设只有鼠标输入的内容将不需要直接修改就能正常工作。理想情况下,一个支持指针的应用程序不需要显式处理鼠标输入。然而,由于浏览器必须处理鼠标事件,因此可能需要处理一些兼容性问题。本节包含了关于指针事件和鼠标事件交互的信息,以及对应用程序开发人员的影响。

trans-unit.source: Always have vertex attrib 0 array enabled. If you draw with vertex attrib 0 array disabled, you will force the browser to do complicated emulation when running on desktop OpenGL (e.g. on Mac OSX). This is because in desktop OpenGL, nothing gets drawn if vertex attrib 0 is not array-enabled. You can use bindAttribLocation() to force a vertex attribute to use location 0, and use enableVertexAttribArray() to make it array-enabled.
trans-unit.target: 始终启用顶点属性0数组。如果在禁用顶点attrib 0数组的情况下进行绘制，则在桌面OpenGL（例如Mac OSX）上运行时，将迫使浏览器进行复杂的仿真。这是因为在桌面OpenGL中，如果未启用顶点属性0，则不会绘制任何内容。您可以使用 bindAttribLocation() 强制顶点属性使用位置 0 ，并使用 enableVertexAttribArray() 使它启用数组。

trans-unit.target: 始终确定将创建(或重复使用)一个新的辅助窗口的链接。

trans-unit.source: Always maintain head tracking (this is the most important of all, especially if it occurs in middle of the experience.)
trans-unit.target: 始终保持头部的追踪(这是最重要的,尤其是当它发生在体验中间的时候。

trans-unit.source: Always make sure that your application runs without generating any WebGL errors, as returned by getError(). In Firefox, every WebGL error (until a certain limit), and some other WebGL issues, are reported as a JavaScript warning with a descriptive message. You don't really want your web app spewing stuff into the user's console, do you? Of course you don't.
trans-unit.target: 始终确保您的应用程序运行时不会产生 getError() 返回的任何WebGL错误。在Firefox中，每个WebGL错误（直到一定的限制）和其他一些WebGL问题都作为带有描述性消息的JavaScript警告报告。您真的不希望您的Web应用程序将内容喷入用户的控制台，是吗？当然不会。

trans-unit.source: Always provide a meaningful name to your target attribute and try to reuse such target attribute in your page so that a click on another link may load the referenced resource in an already created and rendered window (therefore speeding up the process for the user) and therefore justifying the reason (and user system resources, time spent) for creating a secondary window in the first place. Using a single target attribute value and reusing it in links is much more user resources friendly as it only creates one single secondary window which is recycled. On the other hand, using "_blank" as the target attribute value will create several new and unnamed windows on the user's desktop which can not be recycled, reused. In any case, if your code is well done, it should not interfere with the user's final choice but rather merely offer him more choices, more ways to open links and more power to the tool he's using (a browser).
trans-unit.target: 总是为你的目标属性提供一个有意义的名称,并尽量在你的页面中重用这样的目标属性,这样点击另一个链接可能会在一个已经创建和渲染的窗口中加载被引用的资源(因此对用户来说加快了这个过程),从而证明了首先创建一个辅助窗口的原因(和用户系统资源,时间花费)。使用一个单一的目标属性值并在链接中重复使用,对用户资源更加友好,因为它只创建了一个单独的辅助窗口,并被循环使用。另一方面,使用"_blank "作为目标属性值,会在用户的桌面上创建多个新的、未命名的窗口,而这些窗口是无法回收、重复使用的。无论如何,如果你的代码做得很好,它不应该干扰用户的最终选择,而只是为他提供更多的选择,更多的打开链接的方式,为他所使用的工具(浏览器)提供更多的权力。

trans-unit.source: Always reflects the main screen.
trans-unit.target: 始终体现在主屏幕上。

trans-unit.source: Among the use cases for replaceTrack() is the common need to switch between the rear- and front-facing cameras on a phone. With replaceTrack(), you can simply have a track object for each camera and switch between the two as needed. See the example Switching cameras below.
trans-unit.target: 在 replaceTrack() 的用例中，通常需要在电话的后置摄像头和前置摄像头之间进行切换。使用 replaceTrack() ，您可以为每个摄像机简单地创建一个跟踪对象，并根据需要在两个摄像机之间切换。请参阅下面的示例切换相机。

trans-unit.source: An AddressErrors object, which contains DOMStrings describing errors in the properties of a PaymentAddress. For each property in PaymentAddress, a property by the same name is found in shippingAddressErrors if and only if a validation error occurred for that property. In that case, the property in shippingAddressErrors is a string describing the validation error, ideally including suggestions about fixing the error.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AddressErrors 对象，其中包含 DOMString ,描述了 PaymentAddress 属性中的错误。对于 PaymentAddress 中的每个属性，只有且仅当对该属性发生验证错误时，才能在 shippingAddressErrors 中找到一个具有相同名称的属性。在这种情况下， shippingAddressErrors 中的属性是描述验证错误的字符串，理想情况下包括有关修复错误的建议。

trans-unit.source: An AudioNode or AudioParam specifying the node or nodes to disconnect from. If this value is an AudioNode, a single node is disconnected from, with any other, optional, parameters (output and/or input) further limiting which inputs and/or outputs should be disconnected. If this value is an AudioParam, then the connection to that AudioParam is terminated, and the node's contributions to that computed parameter become 0 going forward once the change takes effect. If no matching connection is found, an InvalidAccessError exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AudioNode 或 AudioParam ,指定要断开连接的一个或多个节点。如果此值为 AudioNode ，则将单个节点与任何其他可选参数（ output 和/或 input ）断开连接，从而进一步限制应断开哪些输入和/或输出。如果此值为 AudioParam ，则终止与该 AudioParam 的连接，并且一旦更改生效，节点对该计算参数的贡献将变为0。如果找不到匹配的连接，则抛出 InvalidAccessError 异常。

trans-unit.source: An AudioParam object indicating the a-rate value returned for every sample by this node. The default value is 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AudioParam 对象，指示此节点为每个样本返回的a-rate值。默认值为1.0。

trans-unit.source: An AudioParam whose value is a floating-point value indicating the playback rate of the audio as a decimal proportion of the original sampling rate.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AudioParam ,其 value 浮点值，指示音频的播放速率，为原始采样速率的十进制比例。

trans-unit.target: 一个 AudioParam ,其 value 是3D笛卡尔坐标空间中音频源朝向的方向的X分量。

trans-unit.source: An AudioParam whose value is the X coordinate of the audio source's position, in 3D Cartesian coordinates. The default value is 0.

trans-unit.source: An AudioParam whose value is the Y component of the direction the audio source is facing, in 3D Cartesian coordinate space.

trans-unit.source: An AudioParam whose value is the Z coordinate of the audio source's position, in 3D Cartesian coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AudioParam ,其 value 3D笛卡尔坐标中的音频源位置的Z坐标。

trans-unit.source: An AudioParam will take the rendered audio data from any AudioNode output connected to it and convert it to mono by down-mixing (if it is not already mono). Next, it will mix it together with any other such outputs, and the intrinsic parameter value (the value the AudioParam would normally have without any audio connections), including any timeline changes scheduled for the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AudioParam 将从任何取呈现的音频数据 AudioNode 连接到它的输出，并将其转换由单声道下混合（如果它尚未单声道）。接下来，它将与其他任何此类输出以及固有参数值（没有任何音频连接的 AudioParam 通常具有的值）混合在一起，包括为该参数安排的任何时间轴更改。

trans-unit.source: An AudioParam.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AudioParam 。

trans-unit.source: An RTCRtpReceiver object which is responsible for receiving and decoding incoming media data whose media ID is the same as the current value of mid.

trans-unit.source: An RTCRtpSender object used to encode and send media whose media ID matches the current value of mid.
trans-unit.target: 一个 RTCRtpSender 对象，用于编码和发送媒体ID与 mid 的当前值匹配的媒体。

trans-unit.source: An SVGAnimatedString indicating the ending resource target that opens the document when the link is activated.
trans-unit.target: 指示链接激活时打开文档的结束资源目标的 SVGAnimatedString 。

trans-unit.source: An VideoTrackList object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 VideoTrackList 对象。

trans-unit.source: An keyframe object or null.
trans-unit.target: 一个关键帧的对象或 null 。

trans-unit.source: An AddressErrors object which contains error messages for any of the fields in the shipping address that failed validation.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AddressErrors 对象，其中包含送货地址中验证失败的任何字段的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: An AddressErrors object which includes an error message for each property of the shipping address that could not be validated.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AddressErrors 对象，其中包含无法验证的收货地址每个属性的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: An AudioBuffer containing the result of processing an OfflineAudioContext.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AudioBuffer ,其中包含处理 OfflineAudioContext 的结果。

trans-unit.source: An AudioBuffer that defines the audio asset to be played, or when set to the value null, defines a single channel of silence (in which every sample is 0.0).
trans-unit.target: 一个 AudioBuffer ，它定义要播放的音频资产，或者当它设置为值 null 时，它定义一个静音通道（每个采样为0.0）。

trans-unit.source: An AudioParam which specifies the value that this source continuously outputs. The default value is 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AudioParam ，它指定此源连续输出的值。默认值为1.0。

trans-unit.source: An a-rateAudioParam representing detuning of oscillation in cents (though the AudioParam returned is read-only, the value it represents is not). The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 一个以速率为单位的 AudioParam ,表示以分钟为单位的振荡失调（尽管返回的 AudioParam 是只读的，但它表示的值不是）。默认值为0。

trans-unit.source: An a-rateAudioParam representing the frequency of oscillation in hertz (though the AudioParam returned is read-only, the value it represents is not). The default value is 440 Hz (a standard middle-A note).
trans-unit.target: 一个a速率的 AudioParam ,表示以赫兹为单位的振荡频率（尽管返回的 AudioParam 是只读的，但它表示的值不是）。默认值为440 Hz（标准的中A音符）。

trans-unit.source: An a-rateAudioParam that defines the speed factor at which the audio asset will be played, where a value of 1.0 is the sound's natural sampling rate. Since no pitch correction is applied on the output, this can be used to change the pitch of the sample. This value is compounded with detune to determine the final playback rate.
trans-unit.target: 一个a-rate AudioParam ，用于定义播放音频资产的速度因子，其中值1.0是声音的自然采样率。由于没有在输出上应用音高校正，因此可用于更改样本的音高。将此值与 detune 混合，以确定最终播放速率。

trans-unit.source: An DOMString representing the file's data as a data URL.
trans-unit.target: 表示文件数据为数据URL 的 DOMString 。

trans-unit.source: An EventListener called when a MessageEvent of type MessageError is fired—that is, when it receives a message that cannot be deserialized.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EventListener 称为当 MessageEvent 事件类型的 MessageError 进行烧制，也就是说，当它接收到该不能被反序列化消息。

trans-unit.source: An EventListener called when a MessageEvent of type message is fired on the port—that is, when the port receives a message.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EventListener 当被叫 MessageEvent 事件类型的 message 的端口，也就是说，当端口接收到的消息上进行烧成。

trans-unit.source: An EventListener called whenever a MessageEvent of type message bubbles through the worker — i.e. when a message is sent to the parent document from the worker via DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope.postMessage. The message is stored in the event's data property.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EventListener 称为每当 MessageEvent 事件类型的 message 气泡通过工人-即当一个消息从经由工人发送到父文档 DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope.postMessage 。该消息存储在事件的 data 属性中。

trans-unit.source: An EventListener called whenever an ErrorEvent of type error bubbles through to the worker. This is inherited from AbstractWorker.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EventListener 称为每当 ErrorEvent 类型的 error 气泡通过对工人。这是从 AbstractWorker 继承的。

trans-unit.source: An EventListener called whenever an event of type loading is fired, indicating a font-face set has started loading.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EventListener 称为每当类型的事件 loading 被触发，指示字体面集已开始加载。

trans-unit.source: An EventListener called whenever an event of type loadingdone is fired, indicating that a font face set has finished loading.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EventListener 称为每当类型的事件 loadingdone 被触发，指示字体面集完成加载。

trans-unit.source: An EventListener called whenever an event of type loadingerror is fired, indicating that an error occurred whilst loading a font-face set.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EventListener 称为每当类型的事件 loadingerror 被触发，这表明，尽管加载字体面设置发生错误。

trans-unit.source: An EventListener property called whenever an event of type statechange is fired; it is basically fired anytime the ServiceWorker.state changes.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EventListener 属性称为每当类型的事件 statechange 被激发; 它基本上在 ServiceWorker.state 更改时触发。

trans-unit.source: An EventListener property called whenever an event of type updatefound is fired; it is fired any time the ServiceWorkerRegistration.installing property acquires a new service worker.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EventListener 属性称为每当类型的事件 updatefound 被激发; 每当 ServiceWorkerRegistration.installing 属性获取新的服务工作者时，就会触发该事件。

trans-unit.source: An EventListener providing the code to be called when the visibilitychange event is fired.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EventListener ,它提供在 visibilitychange 更改事件被触发时要调用的代码。

trans-unit.source: An EventListener which is invoked whenever an ErrorEvent of type error bubbles through the worker.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EventListener 每当被调用 ErrorEvent 类型的 error 气泡通过工人。

trans-unit.source: An EventTarget which is a callback that will be called when the resourcetimingbufferfull event is fired.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EventTarget 这是一个当将被调用回调 resourcetimingbufferfull 事件。

trans-unit.source: An HTMLCollection representing the set of <option> elements that are selected.
trans-unit.target: 一个 HTMLCollection ,它表示所选的 <option> 元素集。

trans-unit.source: An HTMLFormControlsCollection or HTMLCollection referencing the containing form element, if this element is in a form.
trans-unit.target: 引用包含的form元素的 HTMLFormControlsCollection 或 HTMLCollection （如果此元素在表单中）。

trans-unit.source: An HTMLFormElement indicating the form associated with the control, reflecting the form HTML attribute if it is defined.
trans-unit.target: 一个 HTMLFormElement ,它指示与控件关联的 form 如果定义了表单 HTML属性，则将反映该表单。

trans-unit.source: An HTMLFormElement referencing the form that this element is associated with. If the element is not associated with of a <form> element, then it returns null.
trans-unit.target: 一个 HTMLFormElement 引用与此元素关联的表单。如果该元素与 <form> 元素不相关，则返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: An HTMLOptionsCollection representing the set of <option> elements contained by this element.
trans-unit.target: 一个 HTMLOptionsCollection ,表示此元素包含的 <option> 元素集。

trans-unit.source: An ApplicationCache.
trans-unit.target: 一个 ApplicationCache 。

trans-unit.source: An Array containing a ByteString sequence representing the values of the retrieved header.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含 ByteString 序列的 Array ，该序列表示检索到的标头的值。

trans-unit.source: An ArrayBuffer that holds the globally unique identifier for this PublicKeyCredential. This identifier can be used to look up credentials for future calls to CredentialsContainer.get.
trans-unit.target: 一个 ArrayBuffer ，它保存此PublicKeyCredential的全局唯一标识符。此标识符可用于查找凭据，以便将来对 CredentialsContainer.get 进行调用。

trans-unit.source: An ArrayBuffer.
trans-unit.target: 一个 ArrayBuffer 。

trans-unit.source: An EventHandler called to handle the error event, including reporting errors that arise with media recording. These are fatal errors that stop recording. The received event is based on the MediaRecorderErrorEvent interface, whose error property contains a DOMException that describes the actual error that occurred.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EventHandler 调用来处理该 error 事件，包括报告与媒体记录出现错误。这些是致命错误，将停止记录。接收到的事件基于 MediaRecorderErrorEvent 接口，该接口的 error 属性包含一个 DOMException ，该DOMException描述了实际发生的错误。

trans-unit.source: An EventHandler called to handle the pause event, which occurs when media recording is paused.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EventHandler 调用来处理该 pause 事件，当媒体录制暂停时出现。

trans-unit.source: An EventHandler called to handle the resume event, which occurs when media recording resumes after being paused.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EventHandler 调用来处理 resume 时，当媒体记录被暂停后继续发生。

trans-unit.source: An EventHandler called to handle the start event, which occurs when media recording starts.
trans-unit.target: 调用一个 EventHandler 来处理 start 事件，该事件在媒体录制开始时发生。

trans-unit.source: An EventHandler called to handle the stop event, which occurs when media recording ends, either when the MediaStream ends — or after the MediaRecorder.stop() method is called.
trans-unit.target: 的 EventHandler 调用来处理该 stop 情况下，当记录介质结束时发生，或者当 MediaStream 端部-的或后 MediaRecorder.stop() 方法被调用。

trans-unit.source: An EventHandler called when a MessageEvent of type MessageError is fired—that is, when it receives a message that cannot be deserialized.
trans-unit.target: 的 EventHandler 被调用时一个 MessageEvent 事件类型的 MessageError 进行烧制，也就是说，当它接收到该不能被反序列化消息。

trans-unit.source: An EventHandler called when a transitioncancel event is sent, indicating that a CSS transition has been cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 发送 transitioncancel 事件时调用的 EventHandler ，指示CSS过渡已被取消。

trans-unit.source: An EventHandler called when a transitionend event is sent, indicating that a CSS transition has finished playing.
trans-unit.target: 发送 transitionend 事件时调用的 EventHandler ，指示CSS过渡已完成播放。

trans-unit.source: An EventHandler called when an animationcancel event is sent, indicating that a running CSS animation has been canceled.
trans-unit.target: 发送 animationcancel 事件时调用的 EventHandler ，指示正在运行的CSS动画已被取消。

trans-unit.source: An EventHandler called when an animationend event is sent, indicating that a CSS animation has stopped playing.
trans-unit.target: 发送 animationend 事件时调用的 EventHandler ，指示CSS动画已停止播放。

trans-unit.source: An EventHandler called when an animationiteration event has been sent, indicating that a CSS animation has begun playing a new iteration of the animation sequence.
trans-unit.target: 发送了 animationiteration 事件后，将调用 EventHandler ，该事件指示CSS动画已开始播放动画序列的新迭代。

trans-unit.source: An EventHandler called when an animationstart event is sent, indicating that a CSS animation has started playing.
trans-unit.target: 发送 animationstart 事件时调用的 EventHandler ，指示CSS动画已开始播放。

trans-unit.source: An EventHandler called when an auxclick event is sent, indicating that a non-primary button has been pressed on an input device (e.g. a middle mouse button).
trans-unit.target: 发送 auxclick 事件时调用的 EventHandler ，指示已在输入设备上按下非主要按钮（例如，鼠标中键）。

trans-unit.source: An EventHandler containing the action to perform when a removetrack event is fired when a MediaStreamTrack object is removed from it.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EventHandler ,其中包含从中删除 MediaStreamTrack 对象时触发 removetrack 事件时要执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: An EventHandler containing the action to perform when an addtrack event is fired when a new MediaStreamTrack object is added.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EventHandler ,其中包含在添加新 MediaStreamTrack 对象时触发 addtrack 事件时要执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: An EventHandler containing the action to perform when an ended event is fired on the object, that is when a MediaStreamTrack object is removed from it.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EventHandler ,其中包含在对象上触发 ended 事件时（即，从该对象中删除 MediaStreamTrack 对象时）执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: An EventHandler containing the action to perform when an mute event is fired on the object, that is when the streaming is terminating.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EventHandler ,其中包含在对象上触发 mute 事件（即流终止）时要执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: An EventHandler containing the action to perform when an overconstrained event is fired on the object, that is when a MediaStreamTrack object is removed from it.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EventHandler ,其中包含当在对象上引发 overconstrained 事件（即，从该对象中删除 MediaStreamTrack 对象）时要执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: An EventHandler containing the action to perform when an started event is fired on the object, that is when a new MediaStreamTrack object is added.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EventHandler ,其中包含在对象上触发 started 事件时（即添加新的 MediaStreamTrack 对象时）要执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: An EventHandler containing the action to perform when an unmute event is fired on the object, that is when a MediaStreamTrack object is removed from it.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EventHandler ,其中包含当在对象上触发 unmute 事件（即，从其中删除 MediaStreamTrack 对象）时要执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: An EventHandler fired at the global/worker scope object when the user's preferred languages change.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EventHandler 解雇在全局/工人范围对象时用户的首选语言的变化。

trans-unit.source: An EventHandler or function to call when unhandledrejection events are received by the window. The event handler receives as an input parameter a PromiseRejectionEvent.
trans-unit.target: 窗口接收到 unhandledrejection 事件时要调用的 EventHandler 或函数。事件处理程序接收 PromiseRejectionEvent 作为输入参数。

trans-unit.source: An EventHandler property that specifies the function to execute when a message event is fired on this object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EventHandler 属性，它指定在此对象上触发 message 事件时要执行的函数。

trans-unit.source: An EventHandler representing the code executed when the rejectionhandled event is raised, indicating that a Promise was rejected and the rejection has been handled.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EventHandler ,表示在引发 rejectionhandled 事件时执行的代码，指示 Promise 被拒绝并且已处理了拒绝。

trans-unit.source: An EventHandler representing the code executed when the unhandledrejection event is raised, indicating that a Promise was rejected but the rejection was not handled.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EventHandler ,表示引发 unhandledrejection 事件时执行的代码，该事件指示 Promise 被拒绝，但未处理拒绝。

trans-unit.source: An EventHandler that is called whenever the readyState attribute changes.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EventHandler 被称为每当 readyState 的属性变化。

trans-unit.source: An EventHandler that is called whenever the readyState attribute changes. The callback is called from the user interface thread. The XMLHttpRequest.onreadystatechange property contains the event handler to be called when the readystatechange event is fired, that is every time the readyState property of the XMLHttpRequest changes.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EventHandler 被称为每当 readyState 的属性变化。回调是从用户界面线程调用的。该 XMLHttpRequest.onreadystatechange 属性包含事件处理程序时，被称为 readystatechange 事件被触发，即每次 readyState 的财产 XMLHttpRequest 的变化。

trans-unit.source: An EventHandler that is invoked when the resourcetimingbufferfull event is fired.
trans-unit.target: 触发 resourcetimingbufferfull 事件时调用的 EventHandler 。

trans-unit.source: An EventHandler to handle the tonechange event, which is sent each time an outbound tone starts or finishes playing.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EventHandler 来处理 tonechange 事件，该事件在每次出站音调开始或结束播放时发送。

trans-unit.source: An IDBCursorDirection telling the cursor what direction to travel. Valid values are "next", "nextunique", "prev", and "prevunique". The default is "next".
trans-unit.target: 一个 IDBCursorDirection ,告诉光标行进的方向。有效值为 "next" ， "nextunique" ， "prev" 和 "prevunique" 。默认值为 "next" 。

trans-unit.source: An IDBIndexParameters object, which can include the following properties:
trans-unit.target: 一个 IDBIndexParameters 对象，该对象可以包括以下属性：

trans-unit.source: An IDBTransactionMode object defining the mode for isolating access to data in the current object stores:
trans-unit.target: 一个 IDBTransactionMode 对象，定义用于隔离对当前对象存储中数据的访问的模式：

trans-unit.source: An RGBColor object representing the color value.
trans-unit.target: 代表颜色值的 RGBColor 对象。

trans-unit.source: An RTCCertificateStats object providing statistics related to a certificate being used by an RTCIceTransport.
trans-unit.target: 一个 RTCCertificateStats 对象，提供与 RTCIceTransport 使用的证书有关的统计信息。

trans-unit.source: An RTCCodecStats object containing statistics about a codec currently being used by RTP streams to send or receive data for the RTCPeerConnection.
trans-unit.target: 一个 RTCCodecStats 对象，其中包含有关RTP流当前正在使用的编解码器的统计信息，以发送或接收 RTCPeerConnection 的数据。

trans-unit.source: An RTCContributingSourceStats object which contains statistics related to a contributing source (CSRC) that contributed to an inbound RTP stream.
trans-unit.target: 一个 RTCContributingSourceStats 物体包含与促成入站RTP流一个贡献源（CSRC）的统计信息。

trans-unit.source: An RTCDataChannelStats object which contains statistics about each RTCDataChannel on the connection.
trans-unit.target: 一个 RTCDataChannelStats 对象，其中包含有关连接上每个 RTCDataChannel 的统计信息。

trans-unit.source: An RTCDtlsTransport object representing the DTLS transport used for the transmission and receipt of data packets.
trans-unit.target: 一个 RTCDtlsTransport 对象，代表用于传输和接收数据包的DTLS传输。

trans-unit.source: An RTCIceCandidatePairStats object providing statistics related to an RTCIceTransport. Candidate pairs other than the currently active pair for the transport are deleted when the RTCPeerCandidate changes its RTCPeerConnection.iceGatheringState to "new" during an ICE restart. The active candidate pair is deleted after the transport switches to another candidate pair; this change cannot be detected otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 提供与 RTCIceTransport 相关的统计信息的 RTCIceCandidatePairStats 对象。当ICE重新启动期间 RTCPeerCandidate 将其 RTCPeerConnection.iceGatheringState 更改为 "new" 时，将删除除传输的当前活动对以外的候选对。传输切换到另一个候选对后，将删除活动的候选对；否则无法检测到此更改。

trans-unit.source: An RTCIceCandidateStats object giving statistics about an ICE local candidate; these candidates are found in the output from RTCIceTransport.getLocalCandidates().
trans-unit.target: 一个 RTCIceCandidateStats 对象，提供约一ICE当地候选人统计; 这些候选者可以在 RTCIceTransport.getLocalCandidates() 的输出中找到。

trans-unit.source: An RTCOutboundRtpStreamStats object giving statistics about an outbound RTP stream being sent from the RTCPeerConnection.
trans-unit.target: 一个 RTCOutboundRtpStreamStats 对象，提供有关从 RTCPeerConnection 发送的出站RTP流的统计信息。

trans-unit.source: An RTCPeerConnectionErrorCallback which will be passed a single DOMException object explaining why the request to create an answer failed.
trans-unit.target: 一个 RTCPeerConnectionErrorCallback ，将传递给单个 DOMException 对象，解释为什么创建应答的请求失败。

trans-unit.source: An RTCPeerConnectionErrorCallback which will be passed a single DOMException object explaining why the request to create an offer failed.
trans-unit.target: 一个 RTCPeerConnectionErrorCallback ，将传递给单个 DOMException 对象，解释为什么创建商品的请求失败。

trans-unit.source: An RTCRemoteOutboundRtpStreamStats object that contains information about the RTCRtpSender on the remote peer that corresponds to an RTCRtpReceiver on the local peer. This lets you measure statistics at the remote endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 一个 RTCRemoteOutboundRtpStreamStats 包含有关信息的对象 RTCRtpSender 远端对等节点对应于一个 RTCRtpReceiver 在本地对等体。这使您可以在远程端点上测量统计信息。

trans-unit.source: An RTCRtpParameters object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 RTCRtpParameters 对象。

trans-unit.source: An RTCSessionDescriptionCallback which will be passed a single RTCSessionDescription object describing the newly-created answer.
trans-unit.target: 一个 RTCSessionDescriptionCallback ，将传递一个描述新创建答案的 RTCSessionDescription 对象。

trans-unit.source: An RTCSessionDescriptionCallback which will be passed a single RTCSessionDescription object describing the newly-created offer.
trans-unit.target: 一个 RTCSessionDescriptionCallback 这将被传递单个 RTCSessionDescription 描述新创建报价对象。

trans-unit.source: An RTCSessionDescriptionInit or RTCSessionDescription which specifies the configuration to be applied to the local end of the connection.
trans-unit.target: 一个 RTCSessionDescriptionInit 或 RTCSessionDescription 指定的配置被应用到所述连接的本地端。

trans-unit.source: An RTCSessionDescriptionInit or RTCSessionDescription which specifies the configuration to be considered for the remote end of the connection.
trans-unit.target: 一个 RTCSessionDescriptionInit 或 RTCSessionDescription 指定的配置被认为是用于该连接的远端。

trans-unit.source: An SVGMatrix to be used as the transformation matrix for the path that is added.
trans-unit.target: 用作添加路径的转换矩阵的 SVGMatrix 。

trans-unit.source: An SVGMatrix to use as the pattern's transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: 用作模式转换矩阵的 SVGMatrix 。

trans-unit.source: An TextTrackList object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 TextTrackList 对象。

trans-unit.source: An ARIA role for accessibility tools to determine how to represent this region, if there is no control. Defaults to null.
trans-unit.target: 可访问性工具的ARIA角色，如果没有控制权，则确定如何表示该区域。默认为 null 。

An <angle> with a deg unit.

trans-unit.target: 带有 grad 单位的 <angle> 。

trans-unit.source: An <audio> element to play the audio received by the RTCPeerConnection being "called."
trans-unit.target: 播放由 RTCPeerConnection 接收的音频的 <audio> 元素被“调用”。

trans-unit.source: An Array containing two ReadableStream instances.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含两个 ReadableStream 实例的 Array 。

trans-unit.source: An Array of Animation objects, each representing one animation currently associated with elements which are descendants of the Document on which it's called.

trans-unit.source: An Array of numbers that specify distances to alternately draw a line and a gap (in coordinate space units). If the number of elements in the array is odd, the elements of the array get copied and concatenated. For example, [5, 15, 25] will become [5, 15, 25, 5, 15, 25]. If the array is empty, the line dash list is cleared and line strokes return to being solid.
trans-unit.target: 一个数字 Array ，指定要交替绘制一条线和一条间隙的距离（以坐标空间单位为单位）。如果数组中的元素数为奇数，则将复制并连接数组中的元素。例如， [5, 15, 25] 将变为 [5, 15, 25, 5, 15, 25] 。如果数组为空，则清除破折号列表，并且线条笔触恢复为实线。

trans-unit.source: An Array of numbers that specify distances to alternately draw a line and a gap (in coordinate space units). If the number, when setting the elements, is odd, the elements of the array get copied and concatenated. For example, setting the line dash to [5, 15, 25] will result in getting back [5, 15, 25, 5, 15, 25].
trans-unit.target: 一个数字 Array ，指定要交替绘制一条线和一条间隙的距离（以坐标空间单位为单位）。如果在设置元素时数字为奇数，则将复制并连接数组的元素。例如，将破折号设置为 [5, 15, 25] 5，15，25 ]将导致返回 [5, 15, 25, 5, 15, 25] 。

trans-unit.source: An Array of objects of type RTCCertificate which are used by the connection for authentication. If this property isn't specified, a set of certificates is generated automatically for each RTCPeerConnection instance. Although only one certificate is used by a given connection, providing certificates for multiple algorithms may improve the odds of successfully connecting in some circumstances. See Using certificates below for additional information.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Array 类型的对象的 RTCCertificate 其通过用于认证的连接中使用。如果未指定此属性，则将为每个 RTCPeerConnection 实例自动生成一组证书。尽管给定连接仅使用一个证书，但是在某些情况下为多种算法提供证书可能会提高成功连接的几率。有关其他信息，请参见下面的使用证书。

trans-unit.source: An SVGPoint representing the translation factor that takes into account user "magnification" corresponding to an outermost <svg> element. The behavior is undefined for <svg> elements that are not at the outermost level.
trans-unit.target: 表示转换因子的 SVGPoint ，考虑了与最外面的 <svg> 元素相对应的用户“放大倍数” 。对于不在最外层的<svg>元素，其行为是未定义的。

trans-unit.source: An SVGRect containing the position and size of the viewport (implicit or explicit) that corresponds to the given <svg> element. When the browser is actually rendering the content, then the position and size values represent the actual values when rendering. The position and size values are unitless values in the coordinate system of the parent element. If no parent element exists (i.e., <svg> element represents the root of the document tree), if this SVG document is embedded as part of another document (e.g., via the HTML <object> element), then the position and size are unitless values in the coordinate system of the parent document. (If the parent uses CSS or XSL layout, then unitless values represent pixel units for the current CSS or XSL viewport.)
trans-unit.target: 包含与给定 <svg> 元素相对应的视口的位置和大小（隐式或显式）的 SVGRect 。当浏览器实际渲染内容时，位置和大小值代表渲染时的实际值。位置和大小值是父元素坐标系中的无单位值。如果不存在父元素（即 <svg> 元素表示文档树的根），则此SVG文档作为另一个文档的一部分嵌入（例如，通过HTML <object> 元素），则位置和大小在父文档的坐标系中是无单位的值。（如果父级使用CSS或XSL布局，则无单位值表示当前CSS或XSL视口的像素单位。）

trans-unit.source: An AnalyserNode has exactly one input and one output. The node works even if the output is not connected.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AnalyserNode 有且只有一个输入和一个输出。即使未连接输出，该节点也可以工作。

trans-unit.source: An AudioBufferSourceNode can only be played once; after each call to start(), you have to create a new node if you want to play the same sound again. Fortunately, these nodes are very inexpensive to create, and the actual AudioBuffers can be reused for multiple plays of the sound. Indeed, you can use these nodes in a "fire and forget" manner: create the node, call start() to begin playing the sound, and don't even bother to hold a reference to it. It will automatically be garbage-collected at an appropriate time, which won't be until sometime after the sound has finished playing.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AudioBufferSourceNode 只能播放一次;在每次调用 start() 之后，如果要再次播放相同的声音，则必须创建一个新节点。幸运的是，这些节点的创建成本非常低廉，实际的 AudioBuffer 可以重新用于声音的多次播放。确实，您可以以“一劳永逸”的方式使用这些节点：创建节点，调用 start() 开始播放声音，甚至不必费心去保存对它的引用。它将在适当的时间自动进行垃圾收集，直到声音播放完毕后的某个时间。

trans-unit.source: An AudioBufferSourceNode has no inputs and exactly one output, which has the same number of channels as the AudioBuffer indicated by its buffer property. If there's no buffer set—that is, if buffer is null—the output contains a single channel of silence (every sample is 0).
trans-unit.target: 一个 AudioBufferSourceNode 没有输入和正好一个输出，其具有相同数目的信道作为 AudioBuffer 指示通过其 buffer 性能。如果没有设置缓冲区（即，如果 buffer 为 null )，则输出包含单个静默通道（每个样本均为0）。

trans-unit.target: 一个 HTMLCollection 是节点的列表。单个节点可以通过序号索引或节点的 name 或 id 属性访问。

trans-unit.source: An INVALID_ACCESS_ERR is raised if the CSS value doesn't contain a Counter value (e.g. this is not CSS_COUNTER).
trans-unit.target: 一个 INVALID_ACCESS_ERR 如果该CSS值不包含上升 Counter 值（例如这不是 CSS_COUNTER ）。

trans-unit.source: An INVALID_ACCESS_ERR is raised if the CSS value doesn't contain a Rect value. (i.e. this is not CSS_RECT).
trans-unit.target: 一个 INVALID_ACCESS_ERR 如果该CSS值不包含矩形值升高。（即，这不是 CSS_RECT ）。

trans-unit.source: An INVALID_ACCESS_ERR is raised if the CSS value doesn't contain a float value or if the float value can't be converted into the specified unit.
trans-unit.target: 一个 INVALID_ACCESS_ERR 如果CSS值不包含一个浮点值被升高或者如果浮点值不能被转换成指定的单元。

trans-unit.source: An InvalidState error is raised if the requestData() method is called while the MediaRecorder object’s MediaRecorder.state is not "recording" — the media cannot be captured if recording is not occurring.
trans-unit.target: 一个 InvalidState 如果升高误差 requestData() 方法被调用，而 MediaRecorder 对象的 MediaRecorder.state 如果记录没有发生媒体不能被捕获-是不是“记录”。

trans-unit.source: An InvalidState error is raised if the resume() method is called while the MediaRecorder object’s MediaRecorder.state is "inactive" — the recording cannot be resumed if it is not already paused; if MediaRecorder.state is already "recording", resume() has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 一个 InvalidState 如果引发错误 resume() 方法被调用，而 MediaRecorder 对象的 MediaRecorder.state 是“未激活” -如果它是不是已经暂停录制无法恢复; 如果 MediaRecorder.state 已经在“录制中”，则 resume() 无效。

trans-unit.source: An InvalidState error is raised if the stop() method is called while the MediaRecorder object’s MediaRecorder.state is "inactive" — it makes no sense to stop media capture if it is already stopped.
trans-unit.target: 一个 InvalidState 如果引发错误 stop() 方法被调用，而 MediaRecorder 对象的 MediaRecorder.state 是“不活动” -这是没有意义的一站式媒体捕获，如果它已经停止。

trans-unit.source: An OscillatorNode is created using the BaseAudioContext.createOscillator() method. It always has exactly one output and no inputs. Its basic property defaults (see AudioNode for definitions) are:
trans-unit.target: 使用 BaseAudioContext.createOscillator() 方法创建一个 OscillatorNode 。它始终只有一个输出而没有输入。其基本属性默认值（有关定义，请参见 AudioNode ）：

trans-unit.source: An RTCOfferOptions object providing options to specify when calling RTCPeerConnection.createOffer(). In this case, we state that we want to receive audio but not video.
trans-unit.target: 一个 RTCOfferOptions 对象，提供在调用 RTCPeerConnection.createOffer() 时指定的选项。在这种情况下，我们声明要接收音频而不是视频。

trans-unit.source: An RTCRtpTransceiver is a pair of one RTP sender and one RTP receiver which share an SDP mid attribute, which means they share the same SDP media m-line (representing a bidirectional SRTP stream). These are returned by the RTCPeerConnection.getTransceivers() method, and each mid and transceiver share a one-to-one relationship, with the mid being unique for each RTCPeerConnection.
trans-unit.target: 一个 RTCRtpTransceiver 是一对一个RTP发送器和一个接收器的RTP的共享的SDP mid 属性，这意味着它们共享相同的SDP媒体M-线（表示双向SRTP流）。这些由 RTCPeerConnection.getTransceivers() 方法返回，并且每个 mid 和收发器共享一对一的关系， mid 对于每个 RTCPeerConnection 都是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: An SVGAngle object can be associated with a particular element. The associated element is used to determine which element's content attribute to update if the object reflects an attribute. Unless otherwise described, an SVGAngle object is not associated with any element.
trans-unit.target: 一个 SVGAngle 对象可以与特定的元素相关联。如果对象反映属性，则关联的元素用于确定要更新哪个元素的content属性。除非另有说明，否则 SVGAngle 对象不与任何元素关联。

trans-unit.target: 一个 SVGAngle 如只读，这意味着尝试修改该对象将导致被抛出的异常对象可以被指定。

trans-unit.source: An ICE candidate describes the protocols and routing needed for WebRTC to be able to communicate with a remote device. When starting a WebRTC peer connection, typically a number of candidates are proposed by each end of the connection, until they mutually agree upon one which describes the connection they decide will be best. WebRTC then uses that candidate's details to initiate the connection.
trans-unit.target: ICE候选人描述了WebRTC与远程设备通信所需的协议和路由。当启动WebRTC对等连接时,通常连接的每一端都会提出一些候选协议,直到他们共同商定一个描述他们认为最好的连接的协议。然后WebRTC使用该候选者的详细信息来启动连接。

trans-unit.source: An application can get timestamps for the various phases of resource loading such as redirection, DNS lookup, and TCP connection setup. Those phases and their property names are illustrated in Figure 1.
trans-unit.target: 一个应用程序可以获得资源加载的各个阶段的时间戳,如重定向、DNS查找和TCP连接设置。这些阶段及其属性名如图1所示。

trans-unit.source: An application can get timestamps for the various stages used to load a resource. The first property in the processing model is startTime which returns the timestamp immediately before the resource loading process begins. The fetchStart timestamps follows and redirect processing (if applicable) and preceeds DNS lookup. The next stages are connectStart and connectEnd which are the timestamps immediately before and after connecting to the server, respectively. The last three timestamps are, in order: requestStart - the timestamp before the browser starts requesting the resource from the server; responseStart - the timestamp after the browser receives the first byte of the response from the server; and responseEnd - the timestamp after the browser receives the last byte of the resource. If the resource is loaded via a secure connection a secureConnectionStart timestamp will be available between the connection start and end events.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以获取用于加载资源的各个阶段的时间戳。处理模型中的第一个属性是 startTime ，它将立即在资源加载过程开始之前返回时间戳。所述 fetchStart 时间戳如下和重定向处理（如果适用）和preceeds DNS查找。接下来的阶段是 connectStart 和 connectEnd ，它们分别是紧接服务器之前和之后的时间戳。最后三个时间戳按顺序排列： requestStart -浏览器开始从服务器请求资源之前的时间戳； responseStart -浏览器从服务器接收到响应的第一个字节之后的时间戳；和 responseEnd -浏览器收到资源的最后一个字节后的时间戳。如果资源是通过安全连接加载的，则在连接开始和结束事件之间可以使用 secureConnectionStart 时间戳。

trans-unit.source: An application can register a PerformanceObserver for "frame" performance entry types and the observer will have data about the duration of each frame event. This data can be used to help identify areas that take too long to provide a good user experience.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以为“ frame ” performance entry types 注册 PerformanceObserver ，观察者将获得有关每个帧事件持续时间的数据。此数据可用于帮助识别需要太长时间才能提供良好用户体验的区域。

trans-unit.source: An application can register a PerformanceObserver for "frame" performance entry types. The observer (callback) will be notified when new "frame" events are added to the browser's performance timeline and the frame's duration (length of time) will be available. This data can be used to help identify areas that take too long to provide a good user experience.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以为“ frame ” performance entry types 注册 PerformanceObserver 。该观测时新“（回调）将被通知 frame ”事件添加到浏览器的性能时间表和框架的 duration （时间）将可用。此数据可用于帮助识别需要太长时间才能提供良好用户体验的区域。

trans-unit.source: An application can register a PerformanceObserver for "paint" performance entry types and the observer can retrieve the times that paint events occur. Use this information to help identify areas that take too long to provide a good user experience.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以为“ paint ” performance entry types 注册 PerformanceObserver ，并且观察者可以检索paint事件发生的时间。使用此信息可以帮助您确定花费太长时间才能提供良好用户体验的区域。

trans-unit.source: An application developer can use the property values to calculate the length of time a phase takes and that information can help diagnose performance issues.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序开发人员可以使用属性值来计算一个阶段所需的时间长度,这些信息可以帮助诊断性能问题。

trans-unit.source: An application may consider different factors when defining the semantics of a gesture. For instance, the distance a touch point traveled from its starting location to its location when the touch ended. Another potential factor is time; for example, the time elapsed between the touch's start and the touch's end, or the time lapse between two simultaneous taps intended to create a double-tap gesture. The directionality of a swipe (for example left to right, right to left, etc.) is another factor to consider.
trans-unit.target: 在定义手势的语义时，应用程序可能会考虑不同的因素。例如，触摸点从其起始位置到结束触摸时的位置的距离。另一个潜在因素是时间。例如，从触摸的开始到触摸的结束之间经过的时间，或者在两次同时单击以创建两次双击手势之间经过的时间。滑动的方向性（例如，从左到右，从右到左等）是要考虑的另一个因素。

trans-unit.source: An easy way to start getting some perspective on our model of the cube is to take the Z coordinate and copy it over to the w coordinate. Normally when converting a cartesian point to homogeneous it becomes (x,y,z,1), but we're going to set it to something like (x,y,z,z). In reality we want to make sure that z is greater than 0 for points in view, so we'll modify it slightly by changing the value to ((1.0 + z) * scaleFactor). This will take a point that is normally in clip space (-1 to 1) and move it into a space more like (0 to 1) depending on what the scale factor is set to. The scale factor changes the final w value to be either higher or lower overall.
trans-unit.target: 开始了解我们的多维数据集模型的一种简单方法是获取Z坐标并将其复制到w坐标。通常，将笛卡尔点转换为齐次点时，它变成 (x,y,z,1) ，但是我们将其设置为 (x,y,z,z) 。实际上，我们要确保视图中的点的z大于0，因此我们将其值更改为 ((1.0 + z) * scaleFactor) 可以对其稍作修改。这将需要一个通常位于剪辑空间（-1到1）中的点，并将其移动到更像（0到1）的空间中，具体取决于比例因子设置为什么。比例因子将最终的w值更改为总体上更高或更低。
