trans-unit.target: fullscreenerror 事件的错误处理程序。

trans-unit.source: An error message is displayed in all cases but one. In this example, we ignore "SecurityError" and "PermissionDeniedError" results, treating refusal to grant permission to use the media hardware the same as the user canceling the call.
trans-unit.target: 除一种情况外，在所有情况下都会显示一条错误消息。在此示例中，我们忽略 "SecurityError" 和 "PermissionDeniedError" 结果，将拒绝授予使用媒体硬件的权限与取消呼叫​​的用户相同。

trans-unit.source: An event delivered to a payment handler when a PaymentRequest is made.
trans-unit.target: 发出 PaymentRequest 时传递给付款处理程序的事件。

trans-unit.source: An event handler attribute for the resize event.
trans-unit.target: 调整大小事件的事件处理属性。

trans-unit.source: An event handler attribute for the scroll event.
trans-unit.target: 滚动事件的事件处理属性。

trans-unit.source: An event handler called whenever a paired device is disconnected.
trans-unit.target: 每当配对的设备断开连接时,就会调用一个事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: An event handler called whenever a previously paired device is connected.
trans-unit.target: 每当之前配对的设备被连接时,就会调用一个事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: An event handler fired whenever a SyncEvent event occurs. This is triggered when a call to SyncManager.register is made from a service worker client page. The attempt to sync is made either immediately if the network is available or as soon as the network becomes available.
trans-unit.target: 每当 SyncEvent 事件发生时，都会触发事件处理程序。当从服务工作者客户端页面调用 SyncManager.register 时，将触发此事件。如果网络可用，则尝试立即进行同步，或者一旦网络可用，则尝试进行同步。

trans-unit.source: An event handler fired whenever a fetch event occurs — when a fetch() is called.
trans-unit.target: 每当发生 fetch 事件时 fetch() 即调用fetch（）时）都会触发事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: An event handler fired whenever a message event occurs — when incoming messages are received. Controlled pages can use the MessagePort.postMessage() method to send messages to service workers. The service worker can optionally send a response back via the MessagePort exposed in event.data.port, corresponding to the controlled page.
trans-unit.target: 每当发生 message 事件时（接收到传入消息时）就会触发事件处理程序。受控页面可以使用 MessagePort.postMessage() 方法将消息发送给服务工作者。服务人员可以选择通过 event.data.port 中公开的 MessagePort 发送响应，该消息与受控页面相对应。

trans-unit.source: An event handler fired whenever a notificationclick event occurs — when a user clicks on a displayed notification.
trans-unit.target: 每当发生 notificationclick 事件时（用户单击显示的通知时），都会触发事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: An event handler fired whenever a notificationclose event occurs — when a user closes a displayed notification.
trans-unit.target: 每当发生 notificationclose 事件时（用户关闭显示的通知时），都会触发事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: An event handler fired whenever a push event occurs — when a server push notification is received.
trans-unit.target: 每当发生 push 事件时（接收到服务器推送通知时）就会触发事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: An event handler fired whenever a push event occurs; that is, whenever a server push message is received.
trans-unit.target: 每当发生 push 事件时都会触发事件处理程序；也就是说，每当收到服务器推送消息时。

trans-unit.source: An event handler fired whenever a pushsubscriptionchange event occurs — when a push subscription has been invalidated, or is about to be invalidated (e.g. when a push service sets an expiration time.)
trans-unit.target: 每当 pushsubscriptionchange 事件发生时，即当推送订阅已失效或即将失效时（例如，当推送服务设置到期时间时），事件处理程序就会触发。

trans-unit.source: An event handler fired whenever a pushsubscriptionchange event occurs; for example, when a push subscription has been invalidated, or is about to be invalidated (e.g. when a push service sets an expiration time.)
trans-unit.target: 每当发生 pushsubscriptionchange 事件时都会触发事件处理程序；例如，当推送订阅已失效或即将失效时（例如，当推送服务设置到期时间时）。

trans-unit.source: An event handler fired whenever an activate event occurs — when a ServiceWorkerRegistration acquires a new ServiceWorkerRegistration.active worker.
trans-unit.target: 每当发生 activate 事件时，即当 ServiceWorkerRegistration 获取新的 ServiceWorkerRegistration.active 辅助程序时，都会触发事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: An event handler fired whenever an install event occurs — when a ServiceWorkerRegistration acquires a new ServiceWorkerRegistration.installing worker.
trans-unit.target: 每当发生 install 事件时，即当 ServiceWorkerRegistration 获取新的 ServiceWorkerRegistration.installing worker 时，都会触发事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: An event handler for abort events sent to the window. (Not available with Firefox 2 or Safari.)
trans-unit.target: 发送给窗口的中止事件的事件处理程序。(在Firefox 2或Safari中不可用。)

trans-unit.source: An event handler for close events sent to the window. (Not available with Firefox 2 or Safari)
trans-unit.target: 发送给窗口的关闭事件的事件处理程序。(在Firefox 2或Safari中不可用)

trans-unit.source: An event handler for drag and drop events sent to the window.
trans-unit.target: 发送到窗口的拖放事件的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: An event handler for handled Promise rejection events.
trans-unit.target: 用于处理 Promise 拒绝事件的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: An event handler for scroll events on element.
trans-unit.target: 用于 element 上滚动事件的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: An event handler for the input event on the window. The input event is raised when an <input> element value changes.
trans-unit.target: 窗口中 input 事件的事件处理程序。当 <input> 元素值更改时，引发输入事件。

trans-unit.source: An event handler for the animationcancel event. This event is sent when a CSS Animation unexpectedly aborts (in other words, any time it stops running without sending an animationend event), such as when the animation-name is changed such that the animation is removed, or when the animating node is hidden—either directly or because any of its containing nodes are hidden)—using CSS.
trans-unit.target: animationcancel 事件的事件处理程序。当CSS动画意外中止时（换句话说，它在不发送 animationend 事件的情况下停止运行的任何时间），例如更改了 animation-name 以删除动画或隐藏了动画节点时，将发送此事件。（直接或因为隐藏了其中的任何包含节点）-使用CSS。

trans-unit.source: An event handler for the animationend event. This event is sent when a CSS Animation reaches the end of its active period (which is calculated as (animation-duration * animation-iteration-count) + animation-delay.
trans-unit.target: animationend 事件的事件处理程序。当CSS动画达到其有效期限（计算为（ animation-duration * animation-iteration-count ）+ animation-delay ）结束时，将发送此事件。

trans-unit.source: An event handler for the animationiteration event. This event is sent when a CSS Animation reaches the end of an iteration. An iteration ends when a single pass through the sequence of animation instructions is completed by executing the last animation step.
trans-unit.target: animationiteration 事件的事件处理程序。当CSS动画到达迭代结束时，将发送此事件。当通过执行最后一个动画步骤完成动画指令序列的单次传递时，迭代结束。

trans-unit.source: An event handler for the animationstart event. This event is sent when a CSS Animation starts to play.
trans-unit.target: animationstart 事件的事件处理程序。CSS动画开始播放时发送此事件。

trans-unit.source: An event handler for the devicemotion events sent to the window.
trans-unit.target: 发送到窗口的 devicemotion 事件的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: An event handler for the deviceorientation event, which contains information about a relative device orientation change.
trans-unit.target: deviceorientation 事件的事件处理程序，其中包含有关相对设备方向更改的信息。

trans-unit.source: An event handler for the fullscreenchange event that's sent to a Document when that document is placed into full-screen mode, or when that document exits full-screen mode. This handler is called only when the entire document is presented in full-screen mode.
trans-unit.target: 当文档进入全屏模式时，或者当该文档退出全屏模式时，发送给 Document 的 fullscreenchange 更改事件的事件处理程序。仅当整个文档以全屏模式显示时，才调用此处理程序。

trans-unit.source: An event handler for the fullscreenchange event, indicating that the element has changed in or out of full-screen mode.
trans-unit.target: fullscreenchange 事件的事件处理程序，指示元素已更改为进入或退出全屏模式。

trans-unit.source: An event handler for the fullscreenchange event, which is sent when the element enters or exits full-screen mode. This can be used to watch both for successful expected transitions, but also to watch for unexpected changes, such as when your app is backgrounded.
trans-unit.target: fullscreenchange 事件的事件处理程序，在元素进入或退出全屏模式时发送。这不仅可以用于监视成功的预期过渡，还可以监视意外的更改，例如在应用程序处于后台时。

trans-unit.source: An event handler for the fullscreenerror event that gets sent to a Document when an error occurs while trying to enable or disable full-screen mode for the entire document.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序 fullscreenerror 是被发送到一个事件 Document 时尝试启用或禁用对整个文档全屏模式出现错误。

trans-unit.source: An event handler for the fullscreenerror event when sent to an element which has encountered an error while transitioning into or out of full-screen mode.
trans-unit.target: 当 fullscreenerror 事件发送到在进入或退出全屏模式时遇到错误的元素时，它的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: An event handler for the fullscreenerror event, which is sent when an error occurs while attempting to change into full-screen mode.
trans-unit.target: fullscreenerror 事件的事件处理程序，在尝试更改为全屏模式时发生错误时发送。

trans-unit.source: An event handler for the fullscreenerror event.
trans-unit.target: fullscreenerror 事件的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: An event handler for the orientationchange events sent to the screen object.
trans-unit.target: 发送到屏幕对象的 orientationchange 事件的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: An event handler for the selectedcandidatepairchange event, which is called any time the ICE agent selects a new, better, candidate pair. The current candidate pair can be obtained using getSelectedCandidatePair().
trans-unit.target: selectedcandidatepairchange 事件的事件处理程序，在ICE代理选择新的，更好的候选对时会调用该事件处理程序。可以使用 getSelectedCandidatePair() 获得当前候选对。

trans-unit.source: An event handler for the transitioncancel event. This event is sent when a CSS transition is cancelled.
trans-unit.target: transitioncancel 事件的事件处理程序。取消CSS过渡时发送此事件。

trans-unit.source: An event handler for the transitionend event. This event is sent to when a CSS transition completes.
trans-unit.target: transitionend 事件的事件处理程序。CSS转换完成时，将发送此事件。

trans-unit.source: An event handler for the popstate event on the window.
trans-unit.target: 窗口上 popstate 事件的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: An event handler for the select event on the window.
trans-unit.target: 窗口上选择事件的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: An event handler for the submit event on the window.
trans-unit.target: 窗口上提交事件的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: An event handler for unhandled Promise rejection events.
trans-unit.target: 未处理的 Promise 拒绝事件的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: An event handler function which is called to handle the payerdetailchange event when the user makes changes to their personal information while editing a payment request form.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序功能，当用户在编辑付款请求表单时更改其个人信息时，将调用该事件处理程序功能来处理 payerdetailchange 事件。

trans-unit.source: An event handler function which is to be called whenever the merchantvalidation event is fired at the PaymentRequest, indicating that the payment handler requires the merchant to validate themselves as allowed to use this payment handler.
trans-unit.target: 每当在 PaymentRequest 上触发 merchantvalidation 事件时将调用的事件处理程序功能，指示付款处理程序要求商人验证自己是否允许使用此付款处理程序。

trans-unit.source: An event handler function which is to be called whenever the paymentmethodchange event is fired at the PaymentRequest, indicating that the user has changed payment methods within the same payment handler.
trans-unit.target: 每当被称为事件处理函数，它是 paymentmethodchange 事件在发射 PaymentRequest ，表明用户已经改变了相同的支付处理程序中的付款方式。

trans-unit.source: An event handler is established (by calling our old friend addEventListener() to handle change events on the master gain control. This will simply update the master gain node's volume to the new value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 建立事件处理程序（通过调用我们的老朋友 addEventListener() 来处理主增益控件上的 change 事件。这将简单地将主增益节点的音量更新为控件的新值。

trans-unit.source: An event handler property dispatched before a user is prompted to save a web site to a home screen on mobile.
trans-unit.target: 在用户被提示将网站保存到移动端的主屏幕之前被分配的事件处理程序属性。

trans-unit.source: An event handler property for hashchange events on the window; called when the part of the URL after the hash mark ("#") changes.
trans-unit.target: 窗口上的 hashchange 事件的事件处理程序属性；当井号（“＃”）之后的网址部分发生更改时调用。

trans-unit.source: An event handler property for languagechange events on the window.
trans-unit.target: 窗口上的 languagechange 事件的事件处理程序属性。

trans-unit.source: An event handler property for any ambient light levels changes
trans-unit.target: 任何环境光等级变化的事件处理程序属性。

trans-unit.source: An event handler property for any device orientation changes.
trans-unit.target: 任何设备方向变化的事件处理程序属性。

trans-unit.source: An event handler property for before-unload events on the window.
trans-unit.target: 窗口上卸载前事件的事件处理程序属性。

trans-unit.source: An event handler property for change events on the window.
trans-unit.target: 窗口上更改事件的事件处理程序属性。

trans-unit.source: An event handler property for device proximity event
trans-unit.target: 设备接近事件的事件处理程序属性。

trans-unit.source: An event handler property for paint events on the window.
trans-unit.target: 窗口上油漆事件的事件处理程序属性。

trans-unit.source: An event handler property for right-click events on the window. Unless the default behavior is prevented, the browser context menu will activate (though IE8 has a bug with this and will not activate the context menu if a contextmenu event handler is defined). Note that this event will occur with any non-disabled right-click event and does not depend on an element possessing the "contextmenu" attribute.
trans-unit.target: 窗口上的右键单击事件的事件处理程序属性。除非阻止默认行为，否则浏览器上下文菜单将被激活（尽管IE8存在一个错误，并且如果定义了contextmenu事件处理程序，则不会激活上下文菜单）。请注意，此事件将与任何未禁用的右键单击事件一起发生，并且不依赖于具有“ contextmenu”属性的元素。

trans-unit.source: An event handler property for right-click events on the window. Unless the default behavior is prevented, the browser context menu will activate (though IE8 has a bug with this and will not activate the context menu if a contextmenu event handler is defined). Note that this event will occur with any non-disabled right-click event and does not depend on an element possessing the "contextmenu" attribute.
An event handler property for the MozBeforePaint event, which is sent before repainting the window if the event has been requested by a call to the Window.mozRequestAnimationFrame() method.
trans-unit.target: MozBeforePaint 事件的事件处理程序属性，如果通过调用 Window.mozRequestAnimationFrame() 方法请求了此事件，则在重绘窗口之前发送该事件处理程序属性。

trans-unit.source: An event handler property for user proximity events.
trans-unit.target: 用户接近事件的事件处理程序属性。

trans-unit.source: An event handler property representing a function that is invoked when the change event fires, i.e when the status of media query support changes. The event object is a MediaQueryListEvent instance, which is recognised as a MediaListQuery instance in older browsers, for backwards compatibility purposes.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序属性，表示在 change 事件触发时（即，媒体查询支持的状态发生更改时）调用的函数。事件对象是 MediaQueryListEvent 实例，出于向后兼容的目的，在旧版浏览器 MediaListQuery 其识别为MediaListQuery实例。

trans-unit.source: An event handler that is called when the gatheringstatechange event is fired to indicate that the value of the gatheringState property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 当触发 gatheringstatechange 事件时调用一个事件处理程序，以指示 gatheringState 属性的值已更改。

trans-unit.source: An event handler that is called when the isolationchange event is fired at the track object. This occurs whenever the value of the isolated property changes due to the document gaining or losing permission to access the track.
trans-unit.target: 当在track对象上触发 isolationchange 事件时调用的事件处理程序。每当由于文档获得或失去访问轨道的权限而导致 isolated 属性的值发生更改时，就会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: An event handler that runs when an event of type statechange has fired. This occurs when the AudioContext's state changes, due to the calling of one of the state change methods (AudioContext.suspend, AudioContext.resume, or AudioContext.close).
trans-unit.target: 当 statechange 类型的事件触发时运行的事件处理程序。由于调用状态更改方法之一（ AudioContext.suspend ， AudioContext.resume 或 AudioContext.close ）而导致 AudioContext 的状态更改时，会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: An event handler to be called when the addtrack event is fired, indicating that a new audio track has been added to the media element.
trans-unit.target: 触发 addtrack 事件时将调用的事件处理程序，指示新的音轨已添加到media元素。

trans-unit.source: An event handler to be called when the addtrack event is fired, indicating that a new video track has been added to the media element.
trans-unit.target: 触发 addtrack 事件时将调用的事件处理程序，指示已将新的视频轨道添加到media元素。

trans-unit.source: An event handler to be called when the change event occurs — that is, when the value of the selected property for a track has changed, due to the track being made active or inactive.
trans-unit.target: 发生 change 事件时（即，由于将轨道设为活动或非活动状态而更改了轨道的 selected 属性的值时），将调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: An event handler to be called when the change event occurs. This occurs when one or more tracks have been enabled or disabled by their enabled flag being changed.
trans-unit.target: 发生 change 事件时要调用的事件处理程序。当一个或多个轨道通过更改其 enabled 标志已启用或禁用时，就会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: An event handler to be called when the statechange event is delivered to the RTCIceTransport, indicating that the value of the state property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 当被调用的事件处理程序 statechange 事件被传递到 RTCIceTransport ，表明的价值 state 属性已更改。

trans-unit.source: An event handler to call when the removetrack event is sent, indicating that a video track has been removed from the media element.
trans-unit.target: 发送 removetrack 事件时调用的事件处理程序，指示已从媒体元素中移除视频轨道。

trans-unit.source: An event handler to call when the removetrack event is sent, indicating that an audio track has been removed from the media element.
trans-unit.target: 发送 removetrack 事件时调用的事件处理程序，指示已从媒体元素中删除音轨。

trans-unit.source: An event handler which is called when the fullscreenchange event is sent to the element, indicating that the element has been placed into, or removed from, full-screen mode.
trans-unit.target: 一个事件处理程序，当将 fullscreenchange 事件发送到该元素时被调用，指示该元素已置于全屏模式或从全屏模式中移除。

trans-unit.source: An event listener to be called when a message is received from the server.
trans-unit.target: 当收到来自服务器的消息时,将调用事件监听器。

trans-unit.source: An event listener to be called when an error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 当发生错误时调用的事件监听器。

trans-unit.source: An event listener to be called when the connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: 当连接关闭时要调用的事件监听器。

trans-unit.source: An event listener to be called when the connection is opened.
trans-unit.target: 当连接打开时调用的事件监听器。

trans-unit.source: An event of some kind occurred that canceled the touch; this might happen if a modal alert pops up during the interaction.
trans-unit.target: 发生了某种取消触摸的事件;如果在交互过程中弹出模态警报,可能会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.target: 下面是一个商户验证的例子。

trans-unit.target: 有关如何在CodePen 上使用它的示例。

trans-unit.source: An example of a repeated texture is tiling an image of a few bricks to cover a brick wall.
trans-unit.target: 重复纹理的一个例子是用几块砖的图像来覆盖砖墙的瓷砖。

trans-unit.source: An example of this property is included in the PointerEvent.tiltX example.
trans-unit.target: PointerEvent.tiltX示例中包含此属性的示例。

trans-unit.source: An example of this property is included in the PointerEvent.width example.
trans-unit.target: PointerEvent.width示例中包含此属性的示例。

trans-unit.target: 一个原始头字符串的例子。

trans-unit.target: 下面是一个支付方式变更处理程序的例子;这个例子专门处理使用Apple Pay时对支付方式的变更。

trans-unit.source: An example using rgba()
trans-unit.target: 使用 rgba() 的示例

trans-unit.source: An exception to the rule that device IDs are the same across browsing sessions: private browsing mode will use a different ID, and will change it each browsing session.
trans-unit.target: 设备ID在不同的浏览会话中是相同的规则的一个例外:私人浏览模式将使用不同的ID,并且会在每个浏览会话中改变它。

trans-unit.source: An exception will be thrown, however, if the Range splits a non-Text node with only one of its boundary points. That is, unlike the alternative above, if there are partially selected nodes, they will not be cloned and instead the operation will fail.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果“ Range 将一个非 Text 节点的边界点分割成一个范围，则将引发异常。也就是说，与上面的替代方法不同，如果存在部分选定的节点，则不会克隆它们，而是操作将失败。

trans-unit.source: An existing ImageData object from which to copy the width and height. The image itself is not copied.
trans-unit.target: 一个现有 ImageData 对象，可从该对象复制宽度和高度。图像本身不会被复制。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of Online/Offline events
trans-unit.target: 线上/线下活动说明

trans-unit.source: An html <form> can be sent in four ways:
trans-unit.target: html <form> 可以通过四种方式发送：

trans-unit.source: An identifer or the lock you want to request.
trans-unit.target: 一个识别码或你想请求的锁。

trans-unit.source: An identifier assigned to a pointer event that is unique from the identifiers of all active pointer events at the time. Authors cannot assume values convey any particular meaning other than an identifier for the pointer that is unique from all other active pointers.
trans-unit.target: 分配给一个指针事件的标识符,它与当时所有活动指针事件的标识符相比是唯一的。作者不能认为这些值传达了任何特定的意义,而不是指针的标识符,这个标识符对所有其他活动指针来说是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: An important concept in streams is backpressure — this is the process by which a single stream or a pipe chain regulates the speed of reading/writing. When a stream later in the chain is still busy and isn't yet ready to accept more chunks, it sends a signal backwards through the chain to tell earlier transform streams (or the original source) to slow down delivery as appropriate so that you don't end up with a bottleneck anywhere.
trans-unit.target: 流中的一个重要概念是背压 -这是单个流或管道链调节读取/写入速度的过程。当链中较晚的流仍很忙并且尚未准备好接受更多块时，它将通过链向后发送信号，以告知较早的转换流（或原始源）酌情减慢传递速度，从而避免在任何地方都不会遇到瓶颈。

trans-unit.source: An incompatible change is made to the feature.
trans-unit.target: 对该功能进行了不兼容的更改。

trans-unit.source: An index describing which input into the specified destination AudioNode is to be disconnected. The index numbers are defined according to the number of input channels (see Audio channels). If this parameter is out-of-bound, an IndexSizeError exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 一个索引，该索引描述要断开到指定目标 AudioNode 的哪个输入。索引号是根据输入通道的数量定义的（请参阅音频通道）。如果此参数超出范围，则抛出 IndexSizeError 异常。

trans-unit.source: An index describing which input of the destination you want to connect the current AudioNode to; the default is 0. The index numbers are defined according to the number of input channels (see Audio channels). It is possible to connect an AudioNode to another AudioNode, which in turn connects back to the first AudioNode, creating a cycle. This is allowed only if there is at least one DelayNode in the cycle. Otherwise, a NotSupportedError exception is thrown. This parameter is not allowed if the destination is an AudioParam.
trans-unit.target: 索引，用于描述要将当前 AudioNode 连接到的目的地的哪个输入；默认值为0。索引号是根据输入通道的数量定义的（请参阅音频通道）。可以将一个 AudioNode 连接到另一个 AudioNode ，后者又又连接回第一个 AudioNode ，从而创建一个循环。仅在周期中至少有一个 DelayNode 时才允许这样做。否则，将引发 NotSupportedError 异常。如果目标是 AudioParam ,则不允许使用此参数。

trans-unit.source: An index describing which output from the current AudioNode is to be disconnected. The index numbers are defined according to the number of output channels (see Audio channels). If this parameter is out-of-bound, an IndexSizeError exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 一个索引，用于描述要断开当前 AudioNode 的哪个输出。索引号是根据输出通道的数量定义的（请参阅音频通道）。如果此参数超出范围，则抛出 IndexSizeError 异常。

trans-unit.source: An index into the Blob indicating the first byte that will *not* be included in the new Blob (i.e. the byte exactly at this index is not included). If you specify a negative value, it's treated as an offset from the end of the string toward the beginning. For example, -10 would be the 10th from last byte in the Blob. The default value is size.
trans-unit.target: Blob 中的索引，指示*将*不包括在新 Blob 中的第一个字节（即，不包括恰好在此索引处的字节）。如果指定负值，则将其视为从字符串结尾到开头的偏移量。例如，-10是 Blob 中最后一个字节的第十个字节。默认值为 size 。

trans-unit.source: An index into the Blob indicating the first byte to include in the new Blob. If you specify a negative value, it's treated as an offset from the end of the string toward the beginning. For example, -10 would be the 10th from last byte in the Blob. The default value is 0. If you specify a value for start that is larger than the size of the source Blob, the returned Blob has size 0 and contains no data.
trans-unit.target: Blob 的索引，指示要包含在新 Blob 中的第一个字节。如果指定负值，则将其视为从字符串结尾到开头的偏移量。例如，-10是 Blob 中最后一个字节的第十个字节。默认值为0。如果您为 start 指定的值大于源 Blob 的大小，则返回的 Blob 的大小为0，并且不包含任何数据。

trans-unit.source: An index is a specialized object store for looking up records in another object store, called the referenced object store. The index is a persistent key-value storage where the value part of its records is the key part of a record in the referenced object store. The records in an index are automatically populated whenever records in the referenced object store are inserted, updated, or deleted. Each record in an index can point to only one record in its referenced object store, but several indexes can reference the same object store. When the object store changes, all indexes that refer to the object store are automatically updated.
trans-unit.target: 索引是专门的对象存储，用于在另一个对象存储（称为引用的对象存储）中查找记录。索引是持久键值存储，其中其记录的值部分是引用的对象存储中记录的键部分。每当插入，更新或删除引用的对象存储中的记录时，索引中的记录就会自动填充。索引中的每个记录只能指向其引用的对象存储中的一个记录，但是多个索引可以引用同一对象存储。当对象库更改时，引用对象库的所有索引都会自动更新。

trans-unit.source: An index is already using the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 索引已使用指定 name 。

trans-unit.source: An index specifying which output of the current AudioNode to connect to the destination. The index numbers are defined according to the number of output channels (see Audio channels). While you can only connect a given output to a given input once (repeated attempts are ignored), you can connect an output to multiple inputs by calling connect() repeatedly. This makes fan-out possible. The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 一个索引，指定当前 AudioNode 的哪个输出连接到目标。索引号是根据输出通道的数量定义的（请参阅音频通道）。虽然只能将给定输出连接到给定输入一次（重复尝试将被忽略），但是可以通过重复调用 connect() 将输出连接到多个输入。这使扇出成为可能。默认值为0。

trans-unit.source: An integer specifying the size of the buffer to create for the audio context, in sample-frames, where one sample-frame is a unit that can contain a single sample of audio data for every channel in the audio data. For example, a 512 sample-frame buffer for 8 channels of sound would be 512 * ((sizeof(float32) * 8) * 32) or 524,288 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，指定要为音频上下文创建的缓冲区的大小（以样本帧为单位），其中一个样本帧是一个单位，可以为音频数据中的每个通道包含一个音频数据样本。例如，用于8个声音通道的512个样本帧缓冲区将为 512 * ((sizeof(float32) * 8) * 32) 或524,288字节。

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the result of the comparison; the table below lists the possible values and their meanings:

trans-unit.source: An integer value indicating how many FIR packets have been received by the sender during the current connection. This statistic, available only on receivers for video tracks.

trans-unit.source: An integer value indicating how many bits each audio sample is represented by. The most commonly used sample size for many years now is 16 bits per sample, which was used for CD audio among others. Other common sample sizes are 8 (for reduced bandwidth requirements) and 24 (for high-resolution professional audio).
trans-unit.target: 一个整数值,表示每个音频样本用多少位来表示。现在多年来最常用的样本大小是每个样本16位,它被用于CD音频等。其他常用的样本大小还有8位(用于降低带宽要求)和24位(用于高分辨率专业音频)。

trans-unit.source: An integer value indicating how many samples each second of audio data includes. Common values include 44,100 (standard CD audio), 48,000 (standard digital audio), 96,000 (commonly used in audio mastering and post-production), and 192,000 (used for high-resolution audio in professional recording and mastering sessions). However, lower values are often used to reduce bandwidth requirements; 8,000 samples per second is adequate for comprehensible albeit imperfect human speech, and both 11,025 FPS and 22,050 FPS are often used for low-bandwidth, reduced quality sound and music.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数值,表示每秒钟的音频数据包括多少个样本。常见的数值包括44,100(标准CD音频)、48,000(标准数字音频)、96,000(通常用于音频母带制作和后期制作)和192,000(用于专业录音和母带制作过程中的高分辨率音频)。然而,较低的数值常常被用来降低带宽要求;每秒8,000个样本足以满足可理解的、尽管不完美的人类语音,而11,025 FPS和22,050 FPS常常被用于低带宽、降低质量的声音和音乐。

trans-unit.source: An integer value indicating how many times the receiver sent a NACK packet to the sender after detecting that one or more packets were lost during transport.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数值,表示接收方在检测到一个或多个数据包在传输过程中丢失后,向发送方发送NACK数据包的次数。

trans-unit.source: An integer value whose bits represent the calling Node's relationship to otherNode within the Document. More than one of the bits may be set, if multiple scenarios apply. If otherNode is located earlier in the document and also contains the Node on which compareDocumentPosition() was called, then the DOCUMENT_POSITION_CONTAINS and DOCUMENT_POSITION_PRECEDING bits would be set, resulting in a value of 0x0A or decimal 10.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数值，其位表示主叫 Node 的到关系 otherNode 的内 Document 。如果应用多种情况，则可以设置多个位之一。如果 otherNode 位于文档的较早位置，并且还包含在其上 compareDocumentPosition() 的 Node ，则将设置 DOCUMENT_POSITION_CONTAINS and DOCUMENT_POSITION_PRECEDING 位，结果为0x0A或十进制10。

trans-unit.target: 当无法验证地址的 region 属性时，基于 AddressErrors 的对象将包含 region 属性。返回的字符串说明了错误，并应提供有关纠正方法的建议。

trans-unit.source: An object based on AddressErrors includes a country property if during validation of the address the specified value of country was determined to be invalid. The value is a string describing the error and should offer suggestions for how to correct it.
trans-unit.target: 如果在验证地址期间指定的 country 值无效，则基于 AddressErrors 的对象将包含 country 属性。该值是描述错误的字符串，应提供有关纠正方法的建议。

trans-unit.source: An object based on AddressErrors includes a dependentLocality property when the address's dependentLocality property couldn't be validated. The returned string explains the error and should offer suggestions for how to correct it.
trans-unit.target: 当无法验证地址的 dependentLocality 属性时，基于 AddressErrors 的对象将包含 dependentLocality 属性。返回的字符串说明了错误，并应提供有关纠正方法的建议。

trans-unit.source: An object based on AddressErrors includes a phone property when the address's phone property couldn't be validated. The returned string explains the error and should offer suggestions for how to correct it.
trans-unit.target: 当无法验证地址的 phone 属性时，基于 AddressErrors 的对象将包含 phone 属性。返回的字符串说明了错误，并应提供有关纠正方法的建议。

trans-unit.source: An object based on AddressErrors includes a regionCode property when the address's regionCode property couldn't be validated. The returned string explains the error and should offer suggestions for how to correct it.
trans-unit.target: 当无法验证地址的 regionCode 属性时，基于 AddressErrors 的对象将包含 regionCode 属性。返回的字符串说明了错误，并应提供有关纠正方法的建议。

trans-unit.source: An object based on AddressErrors includes a sortingCode property when the address's sortingCode property couldn't be validated. The returned string explains the error and should offer suggestions for how to correct it.
trans-unit.target: 当无法验证地址的 sortingCode 属性时，基于 AddressErrors 的对象将包含 sortingCode 属性。返回的字符串说明了错误，并应提供有关纠正方法的建议。

trans-unit.source: An object based on AddressErrors includes an addressLine property when validation of the address finds one or more errors in the array of strings in the address's addressLine. The returned string explains the error and should offer suggestions for how to correct it.
trans-unit.target: 当地址验证在地址的 addressLine 的字符串数组中找到一个或多个错误时，基于 AddressErrors 的对象将包含 addressLine 属性。返回的字符串说明了错误，并应提供有关纠正方法的建议。

trans-unit.source: An object based on AddressErrors includes an organization property when the address's organization property couldn't be validated. The returned string explains the error and should offer suggestions for how to correct it.
trans-unit.target: 当无法验证地址的 organization 属性时，基于 AddressErrors 的对象将包含 organization 属性。返回的字符串说明了错误，并应提供有关纠正方法的建议。

trans-unit.source: An object based on ConstrainDOMString specifying one or more acceptable, ideal, and/or exact (mandatory) device IDs which are acceptable as the source of media content.
trans-unit.target: 一个基于 ConstrainDOMString 的对象，它指定一个或多个可接受的，理想的和/或确切的（强制性）设备ID，这些ID可以作为媒体内容的源。

trans-unit.source: An object based on ConstrainDOMString specifying one or more acceptable, ideal, and/or exact (mandatory) facing modes are acceptable for a video track.
trans-unit.target: 基于 ConstrainDOMString 的对象，指定一种或多种可接受的，理想的和/或精确的（强制性）面对模式对于视频轨道是可接受的。

trans-unit.source: An object based on ConstrainDOMString specifying one or more acceptable, ideal, and/or exact (mandatory) group IDs which are acceptable as the source of media content.
trans-unit.target: 基于 ConstrainDOMString 的对象，指定一个或多个可接受的，理想的和/或确切的（强制性的）组ID，这些ID可以作为媒体内容的源。

trans-unit.source: An object based on the FileSystemFlags dictionary, which allows you to specify whether or not to create the entry if it's missing and if it's an error if the file already exists. These options are currently not useful in Web contexts.
trans-unit.target: 基于 FileSystemFlags 词典的对象，使用该对象，您可以指定是否丢失该条目，如果该文件已经存在，则创建错误。这些选项当前在Web上下文中没有用。

trans-unit.source: An object conforming to the RTCIceCandidateInit dictionary, whose members' values are set to the corresponding values in the RTCIceCandidate object.
trans-unit.target: 符合 RTCIceCandidateInit 字典的对象，其成员值设置为 RTCIceCandidate 对象中的相应值。

trans-unit.source: An object conforming to the RTCIceCandidateInit dictionary; the contents of the object should be constructed from a message received over the signaling channel, describing a newly received ICE candidate that's ready to be delivered to the local ICE agent.
trans-unit.target: 符合 RTCIceCandidateInit 字典的对象；对象的内容应从通过信令信道接收的消息中构造，该消息描述了准备好传递给本地ICE代理的新接收到的ICE候选对象。

trans-unit.source: An object conforming to the MediaConstraints dictionary specifying the constraints to use when starting the connection. We want an audio-only connection, so video is false, while audio is true.
trans-unit.target: 符合 MediaConstraints 字典的对象，指定在启动连接时要使用的约束。我们需要纯音频连接，因此 video 为 false ，而 audio 为 true 。

trans-unit.source: An object containing a highWaterMark property. This is a non-negative integer defining the total number of chunks that can be contained in the internal queue before backpressure is applied.
trans-unit.target: 包含 highWaterMark 属性的对象。这是一个非负整数，定义在施加反压之前内部队列中可以包含的块总数。

trans-unit.source: An object containing any HTTP headers that you want to pre-populate your Headers object with. This can be a simple object literal with ByteString values; or an existing Headers object. In the last case, the new Headers object inherits its data from the existing Headers object.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，其中包含您要预填充 Headers 对象的所有HTTP标头。这可以是带有 ByteString 值的简单对象文字。或现有的 Headers 对象。在最后一种情况下，新的 Headers 对象将从现有的 Headers 对象继承其数据。

trans-unit.source: An object containing any data needed to describe the changes made to the payment method. The contents vary depending on the actual payment method chosen, so you will need to refer to the methodName property first, then inerpret the methodDetails after that.
